The setting sun shines on the eastern hill like it is covered with golden yarn.

According to local customs, the mourning period should be at least three weeks.
我扯了件夹袄披上，眼睛又定格在那厚厚的日记上。

发誓
fāshì
vow; pledge; swear
效忠宣誓
xiàozhōng xuānshì
oath of allegiance
他信誓旦旦的承诺不可信。
Tā xìnshì-dàndàn de chéngnuò bùkěxìn。

我敢发誓我从来没有见过这种全身长满棘刺的软体动物。

I swear I have never seen such a mollusk with thorns all over its body.

We have sworn solemnly under the party flag that we will work for Communism all our lives.
剧本中就是这么说的：窦娥受冤屈死，三桩誓愿件件应验。

The play tells that Dou E died in injustice, but her wishes all came true.

The two vowed in their wedding ceremony that they would love each other forever.

他们发誓要相偕走过人生的风风雨雨。

他们对国家效死尽忠，发誓决不当叛徒。
Tāmen duì guójiā xiàosǐ jìn zhōng，fāshì jué bùdāng pàntú。
They devote their lives to the motherland and vow to die rather than become a traitor.
我们坚决反对邪行，誓与所有邪行作斗争。
Wǒmen jiānjué fǎnduì xiéxíng，shì yǔ suǒyǒu xiéxíng zuò dòuzhēng。
We firmly reject illegal actions and swear to fight against them.
我们立誓要为祖国再立新功。
Wǒmen lìshì yào wèi zǔguó zài lì xīngōng。
We swear to make new contributions to our motherland.
作为前朝逸民，我誓死也不在新朝为官。
Zuòwéi qiáncháo yìmín，wǒ shìsǐ yě búzài xīncháo wéiguān。
As a hermit from a declining dynasty, I would rather die than be a courtier of the new dynasty.
老教授发誓要在一年内找到全部逸文。
Lǎo jiàoshòu fāshì yào zài yìnián nèi zhǎodào quánbùyìwén。
The old professor is determined to collect all the anecdotes in a year.
危难时刻，小张发誓要与朋友们生死与共。
Wēinán shíkè，Xiǎo Zhāng fāshì yào yǔ péngyoǒmen shēngsǐ yǔgòng。
At the critical moment, Xiaozhang swore to go through thick and thin together with his friends.
部队誓死也要保护运输线的畅通。
Bùduì shìsǐ yěyào bǎohù yùnshūxiàn de chàngtōng。
The troop swore to the death to keep the tansport route unblocked.
如果侵略者再犯，我们会誓死抵抗！
Rúguǒ qīnlüèzhě zàifàn，wǒmen huì shìsǐ dǐkàng！
If the invaders dare to come once again, we swear to fight against them until the last minute.

bèiqì shìyán
go back on one\'s word
他们发誓海枯石烂不变心。
Tāmen fāshì hǎikūshílàn búbiànxīn。
They vowed that they would always be faithful.

Tā zǎo bǎ shìyán pāodàole jiǔxiāoyúnwài.
He has long since forgotten his promise.

Xīn zǒngtǒng xuānshì jiùzhí.

他不打赢官司，誓不罢休。
Tā bù dǎyíng guānsī，shìbúbàxiū。
He swore not to give up until he had won the case.
他誓死报仇。
Tā shìsǐ bàochóu。
He is ready to die in pursuit of revenge.

发誓
fāshì
vow; pledge; swear

He swore to reform himself thoroughly and begin his life anew.

I swear I have never seen such a mollusk with thorns all over its body.

They swear to go through the ups and downs of life together.

bōxuēzhě yǔ bèibōxuēzhě 
exploiter and exploited

Shèhuìzhǔyì xiāomièle bōxuējiējí。
The Socialist system eliminates the exploiting class.

bōxuēzhě yǔ bèibōxuēzhě 
exploiter and exploited

biànxiàng de bōxuē xíngwéi 
a covert act of exploitation

cánkù de bōxuē
ruthless exploitation

dìzū bōxuē

中间剥削
zhōngjiān bōxuē
middleman\'s exploitation
奸商和贪官勾连起来镇压剥削人民，老百姓苦不堪言。
Jiānshāng hé tānguān gōulián qǐlái zhènyā bōxuē rénmín，lǎobǎixìng kǔbùkānyán。
Unscrupulous merchants collude with corrupt government officials in suppressing and exploiting the people. The common people are suffering unspeakably.
在这部关于清代农奴们贫苦生活的电影中，我扮演的是剥削农奴的农奴主。
Zài zhèbù guānyú Qīngdài nóngnúmen pínkǔ shēnghuó de diànyǐng zhōng，wǒ bànyǎn de shì bōxuē nóngnú de nóngnúzhǔ。
In this film about serfs\' poor lives in the Qing Dynasty ,I played a serf owner exploiting the serfs.
虽然我家过去是上中农，但我们从来没有剥削过别人。
Suīrán wǒjiā guòqù shì shàng zhōng nóng，dàn wǒmen cónglái méi yǒu bōxuē guò biérén。
Though my family used to be upper-middle class peasants, we have never exploited others.
社会主义消灭了剥削阶级。
Shèhuìzhǔyì xiāomièle bōxuējiējí。
The Socialist system eliminates the exploiting class.
残酷的剥削
cánkù de bōxuē
ruthless exploitation
废除剥削制度
fèichú bōxuēzhìdù
abolish exploitative systems
剥削(ｘｕē)
剥削。
在旧中国，广大农民受着残酷的剥削。
残酷剥削
The exploitation of Africa has continued unabated for centuries.
对非洲的剥削已经持续了数百年。
In some illegal coal mines, children under 18 are exploited by mine owners.
在一些非法煤矿中，矿主剥削未满18岁的孩子。
He and his fellow communists were enraged by the exploitation of the workers.
Tā hé xìnyǎng gòngchǎnzhǔyì de tóngbànmen yīn zīběnjiā bōxuē gōngrén ér fènnù。
他和信仰共产主义的同伴们因资本家剥削工人而愤怒。
He exploited his men with low pay.
Tā lìyòng wēibó de gōngzī lái bōxuē shǒuxià de rén。
他利用微薄的工资来剥削手下的人。
He is exploiting the students.
Tā zài bōxuē xuésheng。
他在剥削学生。
The hides were being fleshed by machines.
Shòupí bèi jīqì bōlí kāi。
兽皮被机器剥离开。
门上的漆已剥落了。
Mén shàng de qī yǐ bōluò le。
The paint on the door has peeled off.
剥落
墙皮剥落
漆皮剥落。
漆皮剥落。
The paint wore off.
油漆已剥落。
剥离
表皮剥离
露天开采时，先要把覆盖在矿体上的岩层、土层剥离。
Cork is stripped off allowing new bark to grow in its place.
Mùshuāncéng bèi bōlí，hǎo ràng xīn de shùpí zài nàge dìfāng shēngzhǎng。
木栓层被剥离，好让新的树皮在那个地方生长。
The hides were being fleshed by machines.
Shòupí bèi jīqì bōlí kāi。
兽皮被机器剥离开。
The court found divestiture to be necessary in preventing a monopoly.
Fǎtíng fāxiàn zài fángzhǐ lǒngduàn fāngmiàn jìnxíng zīchǎn bōlí shì bìyào de。
法庭发现在防止垄断方面进行资产剥离是必要的。
剥夺公民权
bōduó gōngmínquán 
deprival of civil right; disfranchisement
剥夺权益
bōduó quányì 
outlawry
剥夺自由
bōduó zìyóu 
deprivation of freedom
剥夺人身自由
bōduó rénshēn zìyóu 
deprivation of personal liberty
剥夺所有权
bōduó suǒyǒuquán 
expropriate
剥夺继承权
bōduó jìchéngquán 
disinherit sb.
选配什么样的人进领导班子，群众有不可剥夺的发言权。
Xuǎnpèi shénmeyàng de rén jìn lǐngdǎo bānzi，qúnzhòngyǒu bùkě bōduó de fāyánquán。
The masses have an inalienable right to have a say in what kind of people should be selected and appointed to the leading group.
剥夺政治权利终身
bōduó zhèngzhì quánlì zhōngshēn 
be deprived of political rights for life
剥夺
bōduó
deprive; expropriate; strip
他的佃权被无情地剥夺了。
Tā de diànquán bèi wúqíng de bōduó le。
He was ruthlessly stripped of his tenant rights.
他被剥夺政治权利5年。
Tā bèi bōduó zhèngzhìquánlì wǔnián。
He was stripped of his political rights for five years.
父亲剥夺了我的继承权。
Fùqīn bōduóle wǒde jìchéngquán。
My father deprived me of my inheritance.
剥夺。
剥夺
不能剥夺别人的发言权。
剥夺政治权利三年。
剥夺政治权利终身。
be deprived of one\'s rights
被剥夺应享的权利
inalienable rights
不可剥夺的权利
to rob sb of sth
剥夺某人的某物
These three aspects are listed among the &quot;unalienable rights&quot; of man.
这三个权利是人类生来享有的不可剥夺的权利。
He was deprived of heritage because he refused to support his father.
由于他拒绝赡养父亲，所以他的继承权被剥夺了。
A totalitarian government often takes basic freedoms away from the citizens.
极权主义国家的政府通常会剥夺公民的基本权利。
I was denied my right to a phone call after I was arrested.
Bèibǔ zhīhòu wǒ dǎdiànhuà de quánlì bèi bōduó le。
被捕之后我打电话的权利被剥夺了。
The government estimates that 250,000 children have been deprived of education.
Zhèngfǔ yùjì 250，000 míng értóng yǐjīng bèi bōduó de shòujiàoyù de quánlì。
政府预计250，000名儿童已经被剥夺的受教育的权利。
Children could be compelled to work, thus effectively denying them schooling.
Háizǐmen kěnéng bèi qiángpò gōngzuò，yīncǐ ér yánzhòng bōduó tāmen shàngxué de quánlì。
孩子们可能被强迫工作，因此而严重剥夺他们上学的权利。
The individual is denied even the opportunity to break the law on conscientious grounds.
Gèrén shènzhì bèi bōduóle yīn zhèngdànglǐyóu wéifǎ de quánlì。
个人甚至被剥夺了因正当理由违法的权利。
Many cases of mild mental handicap are caused by social deprivation.
Qīngdù xīnlǐ quēxiàn de xǔduō bìnglì dōushì yóu shèhuì bōduó yǐnqǐ de。
轻度心理缺陷的许多病例都是由社会剥夺引起的。
He has taken away our right to keep and bear arms.
Tā bōduóle wǒmen yōngyǒu hé xiédài wǔqì de quánlì。
他剥夺了我们拥有和携带武器的权利。
He believes the poor have been cheated of their rights.
Tā xiāngxìn nàxiē qióngrén bèi bōduóle tāmen de quánlì。
他相信那些穷人被剥夺了他们的权利。
They deprived the prisoner of all rights.
Tāmen bōduóle zhège qiúfàn de suǒyǒu quánlì。
他们剥夺了这个囚犯的所有权利。
Don\'t deprive yourself of the foods you enjoy, just eat them in moderation.
Búyào bōduó nǐ xiǎngshòu měishí de quánlì，zhǐyào chī de shìliàng jiù hǎo。
不要剥夺你享受美食的权利，只要吃的适量就好。
We need to permanently shift power away from the dictator.
Wǒmen yào yǒngyuǎn de bōduó dúcáizhě de quánlì。
我们要永远地剥夺独裁者的权力。
He was stripped of his driver\'s license.
Tā de jiàshǐ zhízhào bèi bōduó le。
他的驾驶执照被剥夺了。
The immigrant was stripped of his basic rights.
Zhège yímín bèi bōduóle jīběn quánlì。
这个移民被剥夺了基本权利。
It is not a right for anyone to take a life.
Rènhé rén dōu méiyǒu bōduó tārén shēngmìng de quánlì。
任何人都没有剥夺他人生命的权利。
It resulted in a complete denial of his privileges.
Zhè dǎozhìle duì tā de tèquán de wánquán bōduó。
这导致了对他的特权的完全剥夺。
Personal freedom is curtailed in many countries.
Gèrén zìyóu zài hěn duō guójiā dōu bèi bōduó。
个人自由在很多国家都被剥夺。
The Nazis stripped the Jews of all their assets.
Nàcuì bōduóle yóutàirén de suǒyǒu cáichǎn。
纳粹剥夺了犹太人的所有财产。
A right is not something that somebody gives you; it is something that nobody can take away.
Quánlì búshì mǒugè rén fùyǔ nǐ de dōngxi；érshì shuí yě wúfǎ bōduó de dōngxi。
权利不是某个人赋予你的东西；而是谁也无法剥夺的东西。
The plaintiff claimed that under color of law the officer had deprived him of his civil rights.
Yuángào shēngchēng nà wèi guānyuán yǐ fǎlǜ de míngyì bōduóle tā de gōngmínquán。
原告声称那位官员以法律的名义剥夺了他的公民权。
This property is held inalienably.
Gāi cáichǎn shì bùnéng bèi bōduó de。
该财产是不能被剥夺的。
The man was attainted.
Zhège rén bèi xuāngào bōduó quánlì。
这个人被宣告剥夺权利。
Certain disabling restrictions disqualified him for citizenship.
Mǒuxiē jìnzhǐ xìng de xiànzhì bōduóle tā de gōngmín zīgé。
某些禁止性的限制剥夺了他的公民资格。
He was divested of his rights and his title.
Tā bèi bōduóle quánlì hé tóuxián。
他被剥夺了权利和头衔。
剥削者与被剥削者
bōxuēzhě yǔ bèibōxuēzhě 
exploiter and exploited

bāo tùpí 
skin a rabbit
剥画皮
bō huàpí
rip off sb.\'s mask

抽筋剥皮

漆皮剥落。
漆皮剥落。
剥去一层皮
Inuit skin the animals they hunt to use their fur.
因纽特人将猎得的动物剥皮，获取它们的皮毛。
We do not believe in scalping，nor in killing wounded men.
Wǒmen bú zànchéng bāo tóupí，yě bú zànchéng shāhài shāngyuán。
我们不赞成剥头皮，也不赞成杀害伤员。
The enemies were scalped.
Dírén bèi bāoqù tóupí。
敌人被剥去头皮。
Elizabeth refused to skin the rabbit.
Yīlìshābái jùjué bāo tùzi de pí。
伊丽莎白拒绝剥兔子的皮。

bōxuēzhě yǔ bèibōxuēzhě 
exploiter and exploited
夜幕降临了，篝火毕剥毕剥地点起来了。
Yèmù jiànglín le，gōuhuǒ bìbō bìbō de diǎn qǐlái le。
As night fell, the needfires were kindled with cracking noise.

bāo huāshēng

biànxiàng de bōxuē xíngwéi 
a covert act of exploitation

The paint on the door has peeled off.
由于风雨剥蚀，碑文已无法辨认。
Yóuyú fēngyǔ bōshí，bēiwén yǐ wúfǎ biànrèn。
Owing to the ravages of wind and rain, the inscription on the stone tablet is already undecipherable.
冰川剥蚀
bīngchuān bōshí 
glacial erosion

地租剥削
dìzū bōxuē

bōduó jìchéngquán

重利盘剥
zhònglì pánbō
lend money at usurious rates; exploit by practising usury
不要生吞活剥地搬用外国的经验。
Búyào shēngtūn huóbō de bānyòng wàiguó de jīngyàn。
It\'s no good taking over the experience of foreign countries uncritically.
假的就是假的，伪装应当剥去。
Jiǎ de jiùshì jiǎ de，wěizhuāng yīngdāng bōqù。
Sham is sham, and the mask must be stripped off.
选配什么样的人进领导班子，群众有不可剥夺的发言权。
Xuǎnpèi shénmeyàng de rén jìn lǐngdǎo bānzi，qúnzhòngyǒu bùkě bōduó de fāyánquán。

严酷的剥削
yánkù de bōxuē

bōduó zhèngzhì quánlì zhōngshēn 
be deprived of political rights for life
剥夺
bōduó
deprive; expropriate; strip
对于拖欠剥取农民工工资的行为，我们一定要严惩。
Duìyú tuōqiàn bōqǔ nóngmíngōng gōngzī dìxíngwéi，wǒmen yídìng yào yánchéng。
We must play tough with those who exploit the rural labourers, and delay to pay their salaries.
我们不应该互相剥难，齐心协力才能解决问题。
Wǒmen bùyīnggāi hùxiāng bōnàn，qíxīnxiélì cáinéng jiějué wèntí。
We should not make things difficult for each other, as the problem can only be solved when we unite.
他的佃权被无情地剥夺了。
Tā de diànquán bèi wúqíng de bōduó le。

Though my family used to be upper-middle class peasants, we have never exploited others.
松鼠剥松果的样子真是可爱逗人。
Sōngshǔ bāo sōngguǒ de yàngzi zhēnshì kě\'ài dòurén。
Squirrels are very cute and interesting while they are peeling off pine nuts.
这些地主不知道吞剥了农民多少血汗钱。
Zhèxiē dìzhǔ bùzhīdào tūnbō le nóngmín duōshǎo xuèhànqián。
These landlords have exploited the peasants out of countless money produced through toil.

I was so blind as not to recongnize my benefactor.
我真瞎了眼，把他当做好人了。
Wǒ zhēn xiā le yǎn，bǎ tā dàngzuò hǎorén le。
I was so blind as to take him for a gentleman.

xiā le yìzhī yǎn
be blind in one eye

这些囚犯被捕快用通红的烙铁弄瞎了眼睛。

这个人总是瞎说八道，别相信他。

This man always talks nonsense, don\'t believe him.

他正赶着牛拉着犁杖犁地呢。

He is just driving the cattle, pulling a plough to plough the field.
自从失明以后，他已经慢慢习惯于借助盲杖行走了。

Since losing his eyesight, he has gradually gotten used to walking with a cane.

我的徒步旅行手杖能伸缩，可以把他放到背包里。

When I did make an appearance in court I was still hobbling on crutches.
Dāng wǒ chūxiàn zài fǎtíng shàng shí，réngrán bùlǚpánshān，xūyào yīlài shǒuzhàng。
当我出现在法庭上时，仍然步履蹒跚，需要依赖手杖。
My hiking sticks telescope and can be put into the backpack.
Wǒ de túbù lǚxíng shǒuzhàng néng shēnsuō，kěyǐ bǎ tā fàngdào bēibāo lǐ。
我的徒步旅行手杖能伸缩，可以把他放到背包里。
He heard the tapping of the man\'s cane.
Tā tīngjiàn nà wèi nánshì shǒuzhàng qiāojī de shēngyīn。
他听见那位男士手杖敲击的声音。
在马路上行走时，明杖几乎就是盲人的眼睛。
Zài mǎlù shàng xíngzǒu shí，míngzhàng jīhū jiùshì mángrén de yǎnjīng。
When walking in the street, the stick is the blind person’s eye.
自从失明以后，他已经慢慢习惯于借助盲杖行走了。
Zìcóng shīmíng yǐhòu，tā yǐjing mànmàn xíguànyú jièzhù mángzhàng xíngzǒu le。
Since losing his eyesight, he has gradually gotten used to walking with a cane.

a Buddhist monk\'s staff

禅杖。

他有鼻炎，鼻子有点儿齉

You must release the hatred in your heart. To forgive others is to forgive yourself.
不到之处请原谅。
Búdàozhīchù qǐng yuánliàng。
Please excuse me if I have been inconsiderate in any way.
他既然认错了，就原谅他一次吧。
Tā jìrán rèncuò le，jiù yuánliàng tā yícì ba。
Since he has made an apology, forgive him just this once.
我来晚了，请原谅。
Wǒ lái wǎn le，qǐngyuánliàng。
Please excuse me for being late.
不能原谅的错误
bùnéng yuánliàng de cuòwù
an unpardonable mistake
轻易地原谅自己的错误会使自己不汲汲进取，反而退步。
Qīngyì de yuánliàng zìjǐ de cuòwù huì shǐ zìjǐ bùjíjí jìnqǔ，fǎnér tuìbù。
It\'ll make you go backwards instead of actively progressing if you often forgive your own mistakes easily.
原谅我口拙，这么简单的事我都没说清楚。
Yuánliàng wǒ kǒuzhuō，zhème jiǎndān de shì wǒ dōu méi shuō qīngchu。
Please forgive for not clearly explaining something so plain.
您如此宽洪大量地原谅了我，我该怎么感谢您呢？
Nín rúcǐ kuānhóng dàliàng de yuánliàng le wǒ，wǒ gāi zěnme gǎnxiè nín ne？
You are broad-minded and forgave me. How can I thank you for this?
我们不能原谅那些千夫所指的罪人。
Wǒmen bùnéng yuánliàng nàxiē qiānfū suǒzhǐ de zuìrén。
We shouldn\'t forgive those who are universally condemned.
即使他跪地讨饶，我也不能原谅他。
Jíshǐ tā guìdì tǎoráo，wǒ yě bùnéng yuánliàng tā。
Even it he gets down on his knees, I won\'t forgive him.
他一而再地伤害我，我不会原谅他的。
Tā yīérzài de shānghài wǒ，wǒ búhuì yuánliàng tā de。
He hurt me again and again, I won\'t forgive him.

by your leave
请原谅，对不起；借光，劳驾；如果你允许的话；请允许我这么说

没有人能谅解我。

I\'ve heard you are slightly indisposed these days. I wish you a speedy recovery.
听说您贵体欠安，我特来问候。
Tīngshuō nín guìtǐ qiànān，wǒ tè lái wènhòu。
I came here to see you, because I heard that you were not feeling well.
年来身体欠安，深居简出。
家父近日欠安
听说贵体欠安。
不知玉体欠安。
这段情节的位置安插得欠妥。
The contractors may exercise unassured pleadings to guard project fund that is delayed in payment.
承包商可以行使不安抗辩权以防范工程教拖欠。
主人给他端来一杯茶，他欠了欠身说：“谢谢。”
Zhǔrén gěi tā duānlái yì bēi chá，tā qiàn le qiàn shēn shuō:“xièxie。”
His host brought him a cup of tea, and half rising from his seat, he said, &quot;Thank you.&quot;
俗话说，宁欠阎王债，不欠小鬼钱。
Súhuà shuō，níngqiàn yánwang zhài，búqiàn xiǎoguǐ qián。
As the saying goes, it\'s better to owe a debt to Hades than to the little devils.
用货物抵偿欠款
yòng huòwù dǐcháng qiànkuǎn 
give merchandise in payment for a debt
他太困了，哈欠连天的。
Tā tài kùn le，hāqian lián tiān de。
He kept yawning for he was too sleepy.
我要尽快还清积欠的各种债务。
Wǒ yào jǐnkuài huánqīngjīqiàn de gè zhǒng zhàiwù。
I want to clear up all my outstanding debts as soon as possible.
还清积欠
huánqīngjīqiàn 
clear up all outstanding debts
老账未清，又欠新账。
Lǎozhànɡ wèi qīnɡ, yòu qiàn xīn zhànɡ。 
While old debts are still unpaid, new ones are incurred.
欠脚儿
qiànjiǎor
slightly raise one\'s heels
欠租
qiànzū
be behind with the rent
我欠他十块钱。
Wǒ qiàn tā shí kuài qián。
I owe him ten yuan.
我还欠图书馆一本书。
Wǒ hái qiàn túshūguǎn yìběn shū。
I still owe the library a book.
文字欠通。
Wénzì qiàn tōng。
The writing is not altogether grammatical. or The wording is some-what awkward.
说话欠考虑
shuōhuà qiàn kǎolǜ
be too free with one\'s tongue
爷爷今天身体欠安。
Yéye jīntiān shēntǐ qiàn\'ān。
Grandpa is not feeling very well today.
今年非但没超产，还欠了产。
Jīnnián fēidàn méi chāochǎn，hái qiàn le chǎn。
Not only did we not exceed this year\'s production target, we even fell short of it.
这些馒头欠火。
Zhèxiē mántou qiànhuǒ。
These buns haven\'t been steamed long enough.
身体欠佳
shēntǐqiànjiā
not feel well; be under the weather
这家公司欠款数百万，倒闭了。
Zhèjiā gōngsī qiànkuǎn shù bǎi wàn，dǎobì le。
This company was several million yuan in debt and went bankrupt.
他欠了银行的款。
Tā qiàn le yínháng de kuǎn。
He owes money to the bank.
银行限期要公司还清欠款。
Yínhángxiànqī yào gōngsī huánqīngqiànkuǎn。
The bank demanded that the company repay its debt within the prescribed time limit.
人家帮了那么些忙，也没好好谢谢，总觉得欠情儿。
Rénjiā bāng le nàmexiē máng，yě méi hǎohāo xièxie，zǒngjué de qiànqíngr。
He helped us so much, and we never even thanked him properly. We feel indebted to him.
我们的经验还很欠缺。
Wǒmen de jīngyàn hái hěn qiànquē。
We are still lacking in experience.
我们的工作还有很多欠缺。
Wǒmen de gōngzuò háiyǒu hěnduō qiànquē。
There are still many shortcomings in our work.
他欠身向进来的客人打招呼。
Tā qiànshēn xiàng jìnlái de kèrén dǎ zhāohu。
He rose slightly to greet the visitor.
措词欠妥
cuòcí qiàntuǒ
not properly worded
这件事你办得欠妥。
Zhèjiànshì nǐ bàn de qiàntuǒ。
You didn\'t handle the matter properly.
工厂欠了我们两个月的薪。
Gōngchǎngqiàn le wǒmen liǎnggè yuè de xīn。
The factory still owes us two months\' salary.
他非但没有积蓄，还欠着债呢。
Tā fēidàn méiyǒu jīxù，hái qiàn zhe zhài ne。
He not only has no savings but is also in debt.
他欠了很多债。
Tā qiàn le hěnduō zhài。

购买我店家具，可以先付半数货款，赊欠部分在三个月内付清。

You can always buy our furniture on credit if you can pay half the price now and the rest in three months.

hāqian

欠项
qiànxiàng
liabilities
拖欠大伙儿工钱的包工头可真缺德！
Tuōqian dàhuǒr gōngqián de bāogōngtóu kě zhēn quēdé！
Labor contractors who don\'t pay their workers on time are unforgivable.
这个假期他出去旅行，因此欠下了很多笔债。
Zhège jiàqī tā chūqù lǚxíng，yīncǐ qianxià le hěnduō bǐzhài。
He traveled during his vacation, and left a lot of writings to be finished.
对于拖欠剥取农民工工资的行为，我们一定要严惩。
Duìyú tuōqiàn bōqǔ nóngmíngōng gōngzī dìxíngwéi，wǒmen yídìng yào yánchéng。
We must play tough with those who exploit the rural labourers, and delay to pay their salaries.
他欠人家的债务最终由实物冲抵了。
Tā qian rénjia de zhàiwù zuì zhōng yóu shíwù chōngdǐ le。
The debt he owed to others was offset by practicality at last.
他们付出了很大的努力，但终因方法欠妥功败垂成。
Tāmen fùchū le hěndà de nǔlì，dàn zhōng yīn fāngfǎ qiàntuǒ gōngbài chuíchéng。
Although they tried very hard, they failed on the verge of success because of improper approach.
这批钢材被用来抵销工程欠款。
Zhè pī gāngcái bèi yònglái dǐxiāo gōngchéng qiànkuǎn。
This steel was used in substitution for the financial arrears for the project.
他们说还清欠款就可以顶罪了。
Tāmen shuō huánqīng qiànkuǎn jiù kěyǐ dǐngzuì le。
They said that they would drop the charges if we paid off the debt.
欠债还钱，你就别说遁辞了！
Qiànzhài háiqián，nǐ jiù bié shuō dùncí le！
If you owe money to others, you have to pay. Don\'t quibble!
这笔欠款，我一定在春节以前全部返还。
Zhèbǐ qiànkuǎn，wǒ yídìng zài Chūn Jié yǐqián quánbùfǎnhái。
I will return all the money I borrowed before Spring Festival.
这一百块钱，我该欠他一个月了。
Zhè yìbǎi kuài qián，wǒ gāi qiàn tā yígèyuè le。
I have owed him the one hundred yuan for a month.
我把该欠的都还清了。
Wǒ bǎ gāiqiàn de dōu huánqīng le。
I\'ve paid off all my debts.
这笔帐你已经挂欠一年了，也该还上了。
Zhèbǐ zhàng nǐ yǐjing guàqiàn yìnián le，yě gāi huánshàng le。
It is time to pay the debt that you have owed for one year.
听说您贵体欠安，我特来问候。
Tīngshuō nín guìtǐ qiànān，wǒ tè lái wènhòu。
I came here to see you, because I heard that you were not feeling well.
为了遏止拖欠农民工工资的现象，我写了份呼吁书。
Wèile èzhǐ tuōqian nóngmíngōng gōngzī de xiàn xiàng，wǒ xiě le fèn hūyùshū。
In order to hold back the phenomena of defaulting on the wages of the farm workers, I have written an appealing letter.
他一副苦大仇深的样子，好象谁都欠了他的钱似的。
Tā yífù kǔdà chóushēn de yàngzi，hǎo xiàng shéi dōu qian le tā de qián sì de。
It seems that he suffers bitterly and nurses deep hatred, believing everybody owes him.
我只有这么一点钱，连欠款的零数都不够。
Wǒ zhǐyǒu zhème yìdiǎn qián，lián qiankuǎn de língshù dōu búgòu。
This is all I have, which is less than the fraction of my debts.
由于欠地主家的钱，她不得已签了卖身契。
Yóuyú qiàn dìzhǔ jiā de qián，tā bùdéyǐ qiān le màishēnqì。
She had to sign an indenture to sell herself, because she owed money to the landlord.
你打哈欠了，莫不是困了吧？
Nǐ dǎ hāqian le，mòbúshì kùn le ba？
You are yawning. Could it be that you are sleepy?
我们欠下的环境的污染孽债，难道要等下一代来偿还吗？
Wǒmen qiànxià de huánjìng de wūrǎn nièzhài，nándào yào děng xià yídài lái chánghuán ma?
Should the next generation pay for what we have done to the environment?
国家要求各大工厂年底必须对农民工清欠。
Guójiā yāoqiú gè dà gōngchǎng niándǐ bìxū duì nóngmíngōng qīngqiàn。
The state demands all the big plants must clear their debts to farm workers.
他总是寻隙找茬，我看就是欠揍。
Tā zǒngshì xúnxì zhǎochá，wǒ kàn jiùshì qiàn zòu。
He always takes advantage of things. I think that he needs a spanking.
你非法拖欠工人工资，我们将依法对你提出民事诉讼！
Nǐ fēifǎ tuōqiàn gōngrén gōngzī，wǒmen jiāng yīfǎ duì nǐ tíchū mínshì sùsòng！
We will bring civil action to you according to law, because you illegally defaulted on the employees’ wages.
他因欠钱不还而被人起诉，法院判他承担还钱的民事责任。
Tā yīn qiànqián bùhuán ér bèi rén qǐsù，fǎyuàn pàn tā chéngdān huánqián de mínshì zérèn。
He was indicted on the charge of not paying debts. The court judged him to bear the civil liability of clearing all debts.

如抵押没有支付的话，我们就会拖欠款项。
The house was in default and the bank will repossess it.

Cáiwùbù huì cuàngǎi yìxiē tuōqiàn zhànghù。
财务部会篡改一些拖欠账户。

他打了个哈欠，嘴巴张开，像一个巨大的红色洞口。
He barely had time to pay his dues, let alone think up any new material.

他几乎没有时间来支付其欠款，更不用说发明任何新材料。
His phone bill is past due.
Tā de diànhuà qiànfèi le。
他的电话欠费了。

她的家庭欠债了。

我们欠你多少钱？
This is worth far more than they owe on it.

hāqian

Acute illness is the most dangerous because it can come without any warning.

He often bursts in conversations without any notice.

他经常毫无征兆地突然发话。

“Perjure”（shǐ zuò wěizhèng）shì yí gè fǎnshēn dòngcí，yīnwèi nǐ zhǐnéng shǐ zìjǐ érfēi tārén zuò wěizhèng。
“perjure”（使做伪证）是一个反身动词，因为你只能使自己而非他人做伪证。

&quot;Perjure&quot; is a reflexive verb because you cannot perjure anyone but yourself.
“Perjure”（shǐ zuò wěizhèng）shì yí gè fǎnshēn dòngcí，yīnwèi nǐ zhǐnéng shǐ zìjǐ érfēi tārén zuò wěizhèng。
“perjure”（使做伪证）是一个反身动词，因为你只能使自己而非他人做伪证。

Tā yǒu duōzhǒng bùtóng de wěizhuāng。
他有多种不同的伪装。
He is a master of disguise.
Tā shì yí gè wěizhuāng gāoshǒu。
他是一个伪装高手。
The theatrical notion of disguise is associated with disaster in his stories.
Guānyú wěizhuāng de kuāzhāng xiǎngfǎ yǔ tā shēnghuó zhōng de zāinàn yǒuguān。
关于伪装的夸张想法与他生活中的灾难有关。
It was just pretend.
Nà zhǐshì wěizhuāng。
那只是伪装。
He faked the signature.
Tā wěizàole qiānmíng。
他伪造了签名。
She forged a green card.
Tā wěizàole yí fèn lǜkǎ。
她伪造了一份绿卡。
He confused the enemy with feints and demonstrations.
Tā yòng wěizhuāng hé yǎnshì lái míhuò dírén。
他用伪装和演示来迷惑敌人。
The statement given under oath was untruthful.
Zài xuānshì xià zuòchū de zhè fèn shēngmíng shì xūwěi de。
在宣誓下做出的这份声明是虚伪的。
The satire touches with finespun ridicule every kind of human pretense.
Fěngcì wénxué duì rénlèi de gè zhǒng xūwěi xíngwéi jìnxíngle jīngmiào de cháofěng。
讽刺文学对人类的各种虚伪行为进行了精妙的嘲讽。
She may be detached or even unfeeling but at least she\'s not hypocritically effusive.
Tā huòxǔ shì lěngmò de，shènzhì shì wúqíng de，dàn zhìshǎo tā méiyǒu xūwěi de guòfèn rèqíng。
她或许是冷漠的，甚至是无情的，但至少她没有虚伪地过分热情。
The troops camouflaged themselves before they went into enemy territory.
Jūnduì zài jìnrù dífāng lǐngdì zhīqián jìnxíngle wěizhuāng。
军队在进入敌方领地之前进行了伪装。
He behaved hypocritically by praying piously when people were watching.
Rénmen kànzhe tā de shíhou，tā xūwěi de jiǎzhuāng zìjǐ zài qiánchéng de qídǎo。
人们看着他的时候，他虚伪地假装自己在虔诚地祈祷。
The man scrupled to perjure himself.
Zhège rén duì zuò wěizhèng yóuyù le。
这个人对做伪证犹豫了。
She was sanctimoniously criticizing everybody.
Tā wěishàn de pīpíngzhe měi yí gè rén。
她伪善地批评着每一个人。
He was unrecognized in his disguise.
Tā chuānzhuó wěizhuāng méi bèi fāxiàn。
他穿着伪装没被发现。
They counterfeited dollar bills.

他们伪造了美元钞票。
Paulson\'s inability to dissimulate is at times endearing.

有些时候，保尔森不善伪装的性格显得可爱。
His father owns and runs an international media syndicate.

The larger meeting area is useful for bringing together syndicate groups.
Gèngdà de nàgè huìyì qū hěn yǒuyòng，kěyǐ bǎ xīndíjiā jítuán jùjí zài yìqǐ。
更大的那个会议区很有用，可以把辛迪加集团聚集在一起。
The banks syndicated.

这些银行组成了辛迪加。

Rénrén yào yǎngchéng zūnshǒu fǎdù de xíguàn，chùchù yángé yàoqiú zìjǐ。
Everybody should conform to norms and be strict with themselves.
这项规定是我们理事会共议决定的结果，请大家遵照执行。
Zhè xiàng guīdìng shì wǒmen lǐshìhuì gòngyì juédìng de jiéguǒ，qǐng dàjiā zūnzhào zhíxíng。
This regulation is the conclusion jointly made during our board meeting. Everyone should abide by it.
国际间的事务往来要遵守国际法。
Guójì jiān de shìwù wǎnglái yào zūnshǒu guójìfǎ。
International business should be conducted in accordance with the law of nations.
司机开车时要遵守交通规则，做到红灯亮，车辆停。
Sījī kāichē shí yào zūnshǒu jiāotōng guīzé，zuòdào hóngdēng liàng，chēliàng tíng。
Drivers must observe the traffic rules while driving. Once the light turns to red, they must stop the car.
遵守会规是对每个会员最基本的要求。
Zūnshǒu huìguī shì duì měigè huìyuán zuì jīběn de yāoqiú。
It is a basic request for every member to abide by the association rules.
机动车上道一定要遵守交通规则。
Jīdòngchē shàngdào yídìng yào zūnshǒu jiāotōng guīzé。
Motorcars must observe traffic rules on the road.
行人也要遵守交通法规。
Xíngrén yěyào zūnshǒu jiāotōng fǎguī。
Pedestrians should also follow traffic regulations.
进了佛门就要遵守佛家的戒规。
Jìn le fómén jiùyào zūnshǒu fójiā de jièguī。
Once you convert to Buddhism, you are supposed to follow e Buddhist rules and regulations.
入了佛门就要遵守佛家的戒条。
Rù le fómén jiùyào zūnshǒu fójiā de jiètiáo。
Once converted to Buddhism, one is supposed to follow Buddhist rules.
每一个警员都要守国法、遵警纪。
Měi yígè jǐngyuán dōuyào shǒu guófǎ、zūn jǐngjì。
Every policemen should abide by the law and the police regulations.
作为一名军人，必须无条件地遵守军规！
Zuòwéi yìmíng jūnrén，bìxū wú tiáojiàn de zūnshǒu jūnguī！
A soldier must follow military regulations with no exceptions.
他不遵纪守法，终于有一天郎当入狱。
Tā bùzūnjì shǒufǎ，zhōng yú yǒu yìtiān lángdāng rùyù。
He didn\'t abide by laws, and observed discipline but was chained and put in prison one day.
这种临时性的法规我们也要严格遵守。
Zhèzhǒng línshíxìng de fǎguī wǒmen yěyào yángé zūnshǒu。
Even though they are provisional rules, they should be observed strictly.
请大家遵守剧场秩序，按号入坐。
Qǐng dàjiā zūnshǒu jùchǎng zhìxù，ànhào rùzuò。
Please abide by the rules of the theater. Take your seat according to your seat number.
十三辙是戏曲、曲艺约定俗成要遵照的韵脚辙口。
Shísānzhé shì xìqǔ、qǔyì yuēdìng súchéng yào zūnzhào de yùnjiǎo zhékǒu。
The Thirteen Rhymes are the established rhymes in operas and other folk art forms.
他连交朋友都遵循实用主义原则，未免有些过于世俗了。
Tā lián jiāo péngyou dōu zūnxún shíyòngzhǔyì yuánzé，wèimiǎn yǒuxiē guòyú shìsú le。
He is so vulgar, he sticks to pragmatic principles even when making friends.
我们至今谨遵爷爷手定的家规。
Wǒmen zhìjīn jǐnzūn yéye shǒudìng de jiāguī。
Still now, we are observing the family rules formulated by grandpa.
从今以后同盟者都要遵守共同的行为规范。
Cóngjīn yǐhòu tóngméngzhě dōuyào zūnshǒu gòngtóng de xíngwéi guīfàn。
From now on, all allies should observe a common code of conduct.
遵守团纪是共青团员必须做到的。
Zūnshǒu tuánjì shì gòngqīngtuányuán bìxū zuòdào de。
It is necessary for all the CYL members to observe the league rules.
所有在教人员都应该遵守教义。
Suǒyǒu zàijiào rényuán dōu yīnggāi zūnshǒu jiàoyì。
All members believing in this religion should abide by its doctrine.
我们在工作中一定要遵守单位的相关章则。
Wǒmen zàigōngzuò zhōng yídìng yào zūnshǒu dānwèi de xiāngguān zhāngzé。
While working, we should abide by the relevant regulations of our unit.
我们行事要遵奉宪法。
Wǒmen xíngshì yào zūnfèng xiànfǎ。
We should act according to the constitution.
他们全家都是遵纪守法的好公民。
Tāmen quánjiā dōushì zūnjì shǒufǎ de hǎo gōngmín。
All the members of the family are good citizens, and abide by laws and observe discipline.
协议已经签订了，希望双方都能遵行。
Xiéyì yǐjing qiāndìng le，xīwàng shuāngfāng dōunéng zūnxíng。
The agreement has been signed. Let\'s hope the two parties abide by it.
在工作岗位上他遵章守纪，从来没有违反过单位的制度。
Zài gōngzuò gǎngwèi shàng tā zūnzhāng shǒujì，cónglái méiyǒu wéifǎn guò dānwèi de zhìdù。
He abides by rules and regulations, and has never violated the regulations of the work unit.
他一再遵嘱我一路小心。
Tā yízài zūnzhǔ wǒ yílù xiǎoxīn.
He urges me to be careful again and again.
没有人真正遵守新规定，都在做表面文章。
Méiyǒurén zhēnzhèng zūnshǒu xīnguīdìng，dōuzàizuò biǎomiànwénzhāng。
No one really respects the new regulations – they\'re all just going through the motions.
不论是谁，都必须遵守法规。

遵守诺言

多数人愿意遵从社会习俗。

在学校，老师教育孩子们要遵守一定的规定。

我的叔叔是个虔诚的人，他一直严格遵守十一奉制度。

摩西是主的仆人，他遵循上帝的命令。

对我来说，遵守佛教的戒律是不可能的。

这些联邦州都要遵从一个普遍的宪法。

他在遵守规章方面很严格。

Our general manager adhered to the company\'s policies in times of trouble.

我们的总经理在困难时期严格遵守了公司的政策。

他接受并遵循了他父母的教导。

Tā yǐ nèizài de mèilì yíngdéle rénmen de zūncóng，ér bú shì kào zhìzào kǒngjù。

宣泄
xuānxiè
lead off (liquids); drain

宣泄
Xuānxiè

宣泄。

Yīnyuè shì tā xuānxiè yíqiè qínggǎn de zuìhòu qúdào。
音乐是她宣泄一切情感的最后渠道。
He vented his spite on Grandfather and the rest of the family.
Tā xiàng tā zǔfù hé qítā jiārén xuānxiè tā de èdú。
他向他祖父和其他家人宣泄他的恶毒。
Playing in the park is a perfect way for children to let off steam.
Zài gōngyuán lǐ wánshuǎ shì ràng háizǐmen xuānxiè jīnglì de juéjiā fāngfǎ。
在公园里玩耍是让孩子们宣泄精力的绝佳方法。
The grounds are perfect for children to let off steam.
Dì shì háizǐmen xuānxiè qínggǎn de zuìhǎo dìfāng。
地是孩子们宣泄情感的最好地方。
泄私愤
xiè sīfèn
vent personal spite
泄私愤，图报复
Xiè sīfèn, tú bàofù
try to revenge a personal grudge
泄私愤。
我不该说那些泄气话。
Wǒ bùgāi shuō nàxiē xièqìhuà。
I shouldn\'t have made those discouraging (or pessimistic) remarks.
这么矮他都跳不过去，真泄气！
Zhème ǎi tā dōu tiào bu guòqu，zhēn xièqì！
He can\'t even jump that high. How pathetic!
别泄气，再有五公里差不多就到部队营区了。
Bié xièqì，zài yǒu wǔgōnglǐ chàbuduō jiù dào bùduì yíngqū le。
Don\'t be discouraged; our camp is about five miles from here.
这起火灾是由于煤气泄漏引起的。
Zhèqǐ huǒzāi shì yóuyú méiqì xièlòu yǐnqǐ de。
This fire was caused by a gas leak.
有气就发泄出来比闷在心里要好得多。
Yǒu qì jiù fāxiè chūlái bǐ mēn zài xīnlǐ yào hǎo de duō。
It\'s much healthier to give vent to your anger than to try to control it.
一定要严防由于煤炉泄露造成的煤气中毒。
Yídìng yào yánfáng yóuyú méilú xièlòu zàochéng de méiqì zhòngdú。
We should take strict precautions against gas poisoning caused by coal stove leaks.
煤气管道的漏泄，极易引起爆炸。
Méiqì guǎndào de lòuxiè，jí yì yǐnqǐ bàozhà。
The leaking of a gas pipe can easily cause an explosion.
泄气。
轮胎泄气了。
不能一遇到困难就泄气。

发生了一起毒气泄漏惨案
The defeat left him dejected and frustrated.
Nà cì cuòbài shǐde tā jǔsàng xièqì。

The balloons deflated.
Qìqiú xièqì le。

Gas leaked into the basement.

泄密事件
xièmì shìjiàn
(a case of) leakage of a state or Party secret
他起誓决不泄漏秘密。
Tā qǐshì jué bú xièlòu mìmì。
He swore that he would not divulge the secret.
泄漏秘密
xièlòu mìmì
let out (or divulge, give away) a secret
他离叛了他的政党并将机密泄露，受到世人的唾骂。
Tā lípàn le tā de zhèngdǎng bìng jiāng jīmì xièlòu，shòudào shìrén de tuòmà。
He betrayed and left his party and leaked its secrets, which made him reviled by the people.
公司机密被泄露出去了。
Gōngsī jīmì bèi xièlòu chūqù le。
The company secrets have been let out.
泄露国家机密
xièlù guójiā jīmì
divulge a state secret

你把秘密泄露出去了吗？
This is a valid objective and should not be denounced.
Zhè shì yí gè yǒuxiào de mùbiāo，bù yīnggāi bèi xièlòu chūqù。
这是一个有效的目标，不应该被泄漏出去。
By and by，the facts leaked out.
Hòulái zhēnxiàng jiù xièlòu chūqù le。
后来真相就泄露出去了。
The container leaked gasoline.
Zhège róngqì xièlòu chū le qìyóu。
这个容器泄露出了汽油。
The news leaked out despite his secrecy.
Jǐnguǎn tā bǎomì，zhè tiáo xiāoxi háishì xièlòu chūqù le。
尽管他保密，这条消息还是泄漏出去了。
How it got out is a mystery.
Tā shì rúhé xièlòu chūqù de yīrán shì yí gè mí。
它是如何泄露出去的依然是一个迷。
Hushed-up stories sometimes leak out.
Mìmì de gùshi yǒushíhòuhuì xièlòu chūlái。
秘密的故事有时候会泄露出来。
The news slowly filtered out of the radio broadcast.
Xiāoxi mànmàn de cóng wúxiàndiàn guǎngbō zhōng xièlòu le chūlái。
消息慢慢地从无线电广播中泄露了出来。
The officer was betrayed his soldiers by revealing their location.
Zhè wèi jūnguān xièlòule shìbīng de wèizhi，chūmàile tāmen。
这位军官泄露了士兵的位置，出卖了他们。
Conversion occurs where cognitive tensions manifest themselves in physical symptoms.
Rènzhī de jǐnzhāng zhuàngtài yǐ tǐzhèng de xíngshì biǎoxiàn chūlái，jiùshì biànxíng fāxiè。
认知的紧张状态以体症的形式表现出来，就是变形发泄。
He\'s going for a walk, I guess he\'s just blowing off some steam.
他想出去去走，我看他只是想发泄一下。
发泄不满情绪
fāxiè bùmǎn qíngxù
express one\'s discontent; air one\'s grievances
有气就发泄出来比闷在心里要好得多。
Yǒu qì jiù fāxiè chūlái bǐ mēn zài xīnlǐ yào hǎo de duō。
It\'s much healthier to give vent to your anger than to try to control it.
这个计划很机密，不得向任何人泄露。
Zhège jìhuà hěn jīmì，bùdé xiàng rènhérén xièlòu。
The plan is top-secret and we can\'t allow it to be leaked to anyone.
泄漏军机
xièlòu jūnjī
leak a military secret
排泄不畅
páixiè bú chàng
drainage difficulty
排泄粪便
páixiè fènbiàn
excrete faeces and urine
他起誓决不泄漏秘密。
Tā qǐshì jué bú xièlòu mìmì。
He swore that he would not divulge the secret.
发泄兽欲
fāxiè shòuyù
gratify one\'s animal desires
挤得水泄不通
jǐ de shuǐxièbùtōng
be packed with people
围得水泄不通
wéi de shuǐxièbùtōng
be so closely besieged that not a drop of water could trickle through
泄私愤
xiè sīfèn
vent personal spite
泄漏天机
xièlòu tiānjī 
give away a secret
此事万不可泄漏出去。
Cǐ shì wàn bùkě xièlòu chū qu。
Be sure not to let it out.
泄私愤，图报复
Xiè sīfèn, tú bàofù
try to revenge a personal grudge
开闸泄洪
kāizhá xièhónɡ
open a sluice to release floodwater
他近来有点泄劲。
Tā jìnlái yǒu diǎn xièjìn。
He has been a bit disheartened lately.
泄漏秘密
xièlòu mìmì
let out (or divulge, give away) a secret
消息已泄漏出去了。
Xiāoxi yǐ xièlòu chūqù le。
The news has leaked out.
敌人无意中泄露了行动计划。
Dírén wúyì zhōng xièlù le xíngdòngjìhuà。
The enemy unwittingly revealed their plan of action.
泄露国家机密
xièlù guójiā jīmì
divulge a state secret
泄密事件
xièmì shìjiàn
(a case of) leakage of a state or Party secret
我不该说那些泄气话。
Wǒ bùgāi shuō nàxiē xièqìhuà。
I shouldn\'t have made those discouraging (or pessimistic) remarks.
这么矮他都跳不过去，真泄气！
Zhème ǎi tā dōu tiào bu guòqu，zhēn xièqì！
He can\'t even jump that high. How pathetic!
泄水工程
xièshuǐ ɡōnɡchénɡ
outlet work
宣泄洪水
xuānxiè hónɡshuǐ
drain off floodwaters
宣泄心中的积郁
xuānxiè xīn zhōng de jīyù
give vent to one\'s pent-up feelings
排泄
páixiè
drain rainwater, waste water, etc.
泄底
xièdǐ
reveal or expose what is at the bottom of sth.
泄愤
xièfèn
give vent to one\'s pent-up anger
宣泄
xuānxiè
lead off (liquids); drain
串话会使我们的一些重要信息泄露。
Chuànhuà huì shǐ wǒmen de yìxiē zhòngyào xìnxī xièlòu。
Some important information could be disclosed because of crossed wires.
因为发生原油泄漏，这里的海域环境恶变。
Yīnwéi fāshēng yuányóu xièlòu，zhèlǐ de hǎiyù huánjìng èbiàn。
The marine environment here has deteriorated due to crude oil leakage.
那艘油轮发生了石油泄漏，现在海面上到处都是浮油。
Nàsōu yóulún fāshēng le shíyóu xièlòu，xiànzài hǎimiànshàng dàochù dōushì fúyóu。
The tanker was leaking oil; the sea is covered with oil now.
涵闸具有挡水、泄水的作用。
Hánzhá jùyǒu dǎngshuǐ、xièshuǐ de zuòyòng。
Culvert and sluice block and sluice water.
在大洪峰到来之前，长河顺利开闸泄洪。
Zài dàhóngfēng dàolái zhīqián，zhǎnghé shùnlì kāizhá xièhóng。
Before the arrival of the huge flood peak, the Yangzi River successfully opens its sluice gate and releases the flood.
他离叛了他的政党并将机密泄露，受到世人的唾骂。
Tā lípàn le tā de zhèngdǎng bìng jiāng jīmì xièlòu，shòudào shìrén de tuòmà。
He betrayed and left his party and leaked its secrets, which made him reviled by the people.
煤气管道的漏泄，极易引起爆炸。
Méiqì guǎndào de lòuxiè，jí yì yǐnqǐ bàozhà。
The leaking of a gas pipe can easily cause an explosion.
一定要严防由于煤炉泄露造成的煤气中毒。
Yídìng yào yánfáng yóuyú méilú xièlòu zàochéng de méiqì zhòngdú。
We should take strict precautions against gas poisoning caused by coal stove leaks.
泄洪时泡漩翻滚、水浪轰鸣，场面很壮观。
Xièhóng shí pàoxuán fāngǔn、shuǐlàng hōngmíng，chǎngmiàn hěnzhuàngguān。
The flood discharge scene is magnificent, with whirlpools rotating and waves roaring.
工人们正在疏通下水管道，防止脏水外泄。
Gōngrénmen zhèngzài shūtōng xiàshuǐ guǎndào，fángzhǐ zāngshuǐ wàixiè。
The workers are unblocking the sewer to prevent the leakage of dirty water.
他无意间泄露了这件本应该保密的事情。
Tā wúyìjiān xièlòu le zhèjiàn běn yīnggāi bǎomì de shìqing。
He accidentally let out this secret.
皇家马德里队下塌的希尔顿饭店被球迷围得水泄不通。
Huángjiā mǎdélǐduì xiàtà de xīěrdùn fàndiàn bèi qiúmí wéi de shuǐxiè bùtōng。
The Hillton Hotel where the Madrid team stayed was surrounded by football fans.
必须修筑围堤，坚决防止污水下泄。
Bìxū xiūzhù wéidī,jiānjué fángzhǐ wūshuǐ xiàxiè.
We must build banks to prevent the flood from flowing downward.
他尝试用各种各样的方法泄恨。
Tā chángshì yòng gèzhǒng gèyàng de fāngfǎ xièhèn。
He tried all means to let out his hatred.
泄洪闸打开了，洪水奔流而下。
Xièhóngzhá dǎkāi le，hóngshuǐ bēnliú érxià。
The spillway is opened and the flood runs down rapidly.
别泄气，再有五公里差不多就到部队营区了。
Bié xièqì，zài yǒu wǔgōnglǐ chàbuduō jiù dào bùduì yíngqū le。
Don\'t be discouraged; our camp is about five miles from here.
谈话节目里酌加点情感宣泄是必要的。
Tánhuà jiémù lǐ zhuójiā diǎn qínggǎn xuānxiè shì bìyào de。
In talk shows, it is necessary to add some emotional release in light of the circumstances.
肿瘤在肠腔里生长阻梗了食物排泄。
Zhǒngliú zài chángqiāng lǐ shēngzhǎng zǔgěng le shíwù páixiè。
The tumor growing in the enteric cavity blocked excretion of food.
不能堵塞泄洪道，否则后果不堪设想。
Bùnéng dǔsè xièhóngdào，fǒuzé hòuguǒ bùkān shèxiǎng。
The spillway can\'t be blocked, otherwise it will cause a serious problem.
汽车把这条路堵得水泄不通。
Qìchē bǎ zhètiáo lù dǔ de shuǐxièbùtōng。
The road was so packed with cars that nothing could get through at all.

Don\'t let this news get out.

Zhèzuò gǔfēnglú shì gāng yǐnjìn de，bùzhīdào hǎoyòng bùhǎoyòng。
This blast furnace has just been imported, so we don\'t know whether it is good or bad yet.
我们学校的锅炉房离宿舍太远了，打趟水要走好久。
Wǒmen xuéxiào de guōlúfáng lí sùshè tài yuǎn le，dǎ tàng shuǐ yào zǒu hǎo jiǔ。
In our school the boiler room is far from the dormitory, so we need to walk a long way to get hot water.
今年冬天，他家买了一个烘炉。
Jīnnián dōngtiān，tā jiā mǎi le yígè hōnglú。
This winter, his family bought a bakery.

Guōlú nuǎnbunuǎn zhíjiē qǔjuéyú huǒfū de jìshù。
Whether a boiler can provide heat or not depends on the stoker\'s skill.
请你把锅炉里的焦砟清理一下。

Please clean up the fragments of burned coals in the boiler.

烧锅炉还是需要块煤的，再买些吧。

Tā zài lúsuànzi lǐ zhǎodào le tā de dōngxi。

我用炉火烧掉了他的照片。

I burnt his photos on the stove.

She bought a cooker from the store, planning to live here for the winter.

我家煤气灶的炉嘴儿该换一个了。

pole a boat; punt

Tā chēng bu zhù，xiào le。
He could not help laughing.
撑伞
chēngsǎn 
open an umbrella
把麻袋撑开
bǎ mádài chēngkāi 
hold open the sack
我已经有点撑，不能再吃了。
Wǒ yǐjing yǒudiǎn chēng，bùnéng zài chī le。
I\'m rather full and can\'t eat any more.
别装得太多，把口袋撑破了。
Bié zhuāng de tàiduō bǎ kǒudài chēngpò le。
Don\'t stuff the sack too full, or it\'ll burst.
角撑
jiǎochēng 
corner brace
他们为了撑场面，借了很多钱大摆喜筵。
Tāmen wèi le chēng chǎngmiàn，jiè le hěnduō qián dà bǎi xǐyán。
In order to keep up appearances, they borrowed a lot of money to give a big wedding party.
撑持局面
chēngchí júmiàn 
shore up a shaky situation
斜撑条
xiéchēngtiáo 
diagonal stay
横撑条
héngchēngtiáo 
cross stay
有他给你撑腰，你还怕什么？
Yǒu tā gěi nǐ chēngyāo，nǐ hái pà shénme? 
He\'s backing you up, so what\'s there to fear?
他用篙一点就把船撑开了。
Tā yòng hāo yì diǎn jiù bǎ chuán chēngkāi le。
He pushed the boat off with a shove of the pole.
撑条和横梁之间角度太大。
Chēngtiáo hé héngliáng zhījiān jiǎodù tài dà。
The brace is at too big an angle with the beam.
支撑门面
zhīchēnɡ ménmiɑn 
keep up appearances; put up a front
我有什么能耐呀，全靠各位撑腰呢！
Wǒ yǒu shénme néngnài ya，quán kào gè wèi chēngyāo ne！
What could I do without you people backing me up?
有病不要硬撑。
Yǒu bìngbúyào yìngchēng。
Don\'t force yourself to work when you are ill.
孩子疼得支撑不住了。
Háizi téng de zhīchēng bú zhù le。
The child couldn\'t bear the pain.
病人支撑着坐了起来。
Bìngrén zhīchēngzhe zuò le qǐlái。
The patient propped himself up into a sitting position.
一家人的生活得由他支撑。
Yì jiā rén de shēnghuó děi yóu tā zhīchēng。
He has to support his whole family.
我累得支撑不住了。
Wǒ lèi dé zhīchēng búzhù le。
再这样拼命工作下去，恐怕大家都会撑不住的。
Zài zhèyàng pīnmìng gōngzuò xiàqù，kǒngpà dàjiā dōu huìchēngbúzhù de。
I\'m afraid no one can keep up if we continue to work so hard.
渔夫撑船离岸，到湖里打鱼去了。
Yúfū chēngchuán líàn，dào húli dǎyú qù le。
The fisherman poled a boat and went fishing on the lake.
没关系，我想我还能撑得住。
Méiguānxi，wǒ xiǎng wǒ hái néng chēngdézhù。
It doesn\'t matter, I can go through this.
撑杆跳高是一项奥运会的比赛项目。
Chēnggāntiàogāo shì yíxiàng àoyùnhuì de bǐsài xiàngmù。
Pole Vault is a competitive event in the Olympic Games.
选择合适的撑杆进行比赛非常重要。

It\'s very important to choose the proper long flexible pole to compete in this event.

Tā huòdé le shàngjiè àoyùnhuì chēnggān tiàogāo de jīnpái。

他买这辆高级轿车主要是为了撑门面。
Tā mǎi zhè liàng gāojí jiàochē zhǔyào shì wèi le chēng ménmiàn。
He bought the saloon car to keep up appearances.
这本书撑死也就四十块。
Zhèběnshū chēngsǐ yě jiù sìshí kuài。
At most, the book is worth 40 Yuan.
饿了很久了，他脸上已呈现饥色，但是因为没有钱只有撑着。

His face is already sallow due to  long-term hunger, but he forced himself not to eat just for lack of money.

Now he is the only one supporting the big family.
我吃了3个山药蛋，肚子有些撑得难受。
Wǒ chī le sāngè shānyaodàn，dǔzi yǒuxiē chēng de nánshòu。
Having eaten three potatoes, I feel stuffed.
咱们这些人里除了他能守摊子，别人谁也不能撑起这件事。
Zánmen zhèxiē rén lǐ chú le tā néng shǒutānzi，biérén shéi yě bùnéng chēngqǐ zhèjiàn shì。

这件衣服是由棉纤维制成的纤维织品。

如果你用热水洗涤，纯棉衣服会缩小。

棉花根系在耕层分布的位置与产量密切相关.
His silk shirt is bordered with a cotton trip around the neck.
Tā de sīchóu chènshān zài bógěng bù jiāle yì quān miánbù quān。
他的丝绸衬衫在脖颈部加了一圈棉布圈。
Cottons are good because they breathe.
Miánbù fēicháng hǎo，yīnwèi tāmen tòuqì。
棉布非常好，因为它们透气。
He also imported raw cotton from America in his own ships.
Tā yě yòng zìjǐ de chuán cóng Měiguó jìnkǒu yuánmián。
他也用自己的船从美国进口原棉。
He wore dark trousers with a light cotton shirt.
Tā chuānzhe shēnsè kùzi，dāpèi qiǎnsè de miánchènyī。
他穿着深色裤子，搭配浅色的棉衬衣。
The United States, China and India all grow cotton plants as crops.

美国、中国和印度都把棉花当农作物种植。

Tā yòng miánxiàn fénghǎole zhèxiē dòng。
她用棉线缝好了这些洞。

These luxuries all had to go under the khmer rouge.

Nothing can rival cotton for durability.

听候吩咐
tīnghòu fēnfù
await instructions
您有什么吩咐？
Nín yǒu shénme fēnfù?
Have you any instructions to give?
听从吩咐
tīnɡcónɡ fēnfù 
be at sb.\'s beck and call; do sb.\'s bidding
我吩咐店小二给我准备一间干净的客房。
Wǒ fēnfù diànxiǎoèr gěi wǒ zhǔnbèi yìjiān gānjìng de kèfáng。
I asked the clerk to prepare a clean guest room for me.
爷爷自知时日无多，吩咐妈妈准备葬礼用的五服。
Yéye zìzhī shírì wúduō，fēnfù māma zhǔnbèi zànglǐ yòng de wǔfù。
Knowing that he did not have much time left, my grandfather asked my mother to prepare the mourning clothes.
这件事是太子千岁吩咐的，我不敢不做。
zhè jiàn shì shì tàizǐqiānsuì fēnfù de，wǒ bùgǎn búzuò。
The task was ordered by the crown prince, so I have to do it.
母亲吩咐我看管好房子。
Mǔqīn fēnfù wǒ kānguǎnhǎo fángzǐ。
Mother instructed me to look after the house.
妈妈吩咐他去买酱油
有什么事您尽管吩咐。
老人家您只要动动嘴吩咐一下就行了。
妈妈吩咐他去买酱油
有什么事您尽管吩咐
Do as you are told.
照吩咐去做。
Do as you are bidden.
照吩咐你的去做。
He said to her to do the laundry.
他吩咐她把衣服洗了。
to do as one is told
按吩咐做事

xixi de xiào 
giggle

他嘻嘻地笑着。

你别嘻嘻哈哈的。

仲夏。

仲裁法庭
zhònɡcái fǎtínɡ 
arbitration tribunal; court of arbitration
仲裁人
zhònɡcáirén 
arbitrator

zhònɡcáishū

仲裁
zhòngcái
arbitrate
我想找个专业的仲裁人咨询一下。
Wǒ xiǎng zhǎo gè zhuānyè de zhòngcáirén zīxún yíxià。
I want to consult a professional arbitrator about this matter.
仲裁
仲裁。
仲裁劳动争议。
海事仲裁。
Today that a panel of arbitrators has decided in favor of our company.
今天仲裁团做出了有利于我们公司的裁决。
the dispute went to arbitration
争论交付仲裁
Arbitration tribunals must issue a decision in 45 days after the acceptance of the case.
仲裁庭必须在受理案件的45天内作出审理。
The arbitration panel list was released yesterday.
昨天公布了仲裁陪审员名单。
The arbitration institution is a civil individual from the national court.
仲裁委员会是源自国家法院的民事独立单位。
At the end of August, the first arbitration case was decided upon.
8 yuè dǐ，dì-yī gè zhòngcái ànjiàn bèi pàndìng。
8月底，第一个仲裁案件被判定。
An industrial tribunal ruled that he was unfairly dismissed from his job on the basis of unjust accusations.
Láozī zhòngcáitíng pàndìng tā bèi yuándānwèi jiěgù shì bù hélǐ de，yīnwèi nà shì jiànlì zài bú zhèngdàng zhǐkòng jīchǔ shàng de jiěgù。
劳资仲裁庭判定他被原单位解雇是不合理的，因为那是建立在不正当指控基础上的解雇。
The arbiter will have the last say.
Zhòngcáiyuán de cáidìng shì zhōngjúxìng de。
仲裁员的裁定是终局性的。
Successful negotiation is the meat and potatoes of arbitration.
Chénggōng de cuōshāng shì zhòngcái de jīchǔ。
成功的磋商是仲裁的基础。
The arbitrator\'s authority derived from the consent of the disputants.
Zhòngcáizhě de zhíquán láizì zhēngyì shuāngfāng de rènkě hé shòuquán。
仲裁者的职权来自争议双方的认可和授权。
An umpire was appointed to settle the tax case.
Zhǐdìng yì míng zhòngcáiyuán chǔlǐ shuìwù ànjiàn。
指定一名仲裁员处理税务案件。

仲裁
zhòngcái
arbitrate
《汉书·刑法志》：“至齐桓公任用管仲而国富民安。” 。
《Hànshū·Xíngfǎzhì》：“zhì Qíhuángōng rènyòng Guǎnzhòng ér guófù mín\'ān。”。
The Penalty and Study of Law, in the History of Han Dynasty said that after Qi Huanggong appointed Guanzhong, the country began to prosper and people lived in peace.
两军实力在伯仲之间，隔江相峙，战争一触即发。
Liǎngjūn shílì zài bózhòng zhījiān，géjiāng xiāngzhì，zhànzhēng yíchù jífā。
With almost the same power, the two armies confronted each other across the river where the battle will soon start.

他是豪爽的仲家人！
Tā shì háoshuǎng de zhòngjiārén！
He is a forthright person of the Bouyei nationality.
他俩不分伯仲。

他功成身退，已经屏迹于世。

咨询
zīxún
seek advice from; hold counsel with; consult
公司设有专门的问事处，如果有什么问题可以去那里咨询。
Gōngsī shèyǒu zhuānmén de wènshìchù，rúguǒ yǒu shénme wèntí kěyǐ qù nàlǐ zīxún。

Wǒ xiǎng zhǎo gè zhuānyè de zhòngcáirén zīxún yíxià。
I want to consult a professional arbitrator about this matter.
作为一个新行业，咨询产业正在茁壮成长。
Zuòwéi yígè xīn hángyè，zīxún chǎnyè zhèngzài zhuózhuàng chéngcháng。
The consultation industry is rising and growing strongly.
有劳您帮我咨询一下。
Yǒuláo nín bāng wǒ zīxún yíxià。

诹访(咨询)

人们现在谈论的是商业咨询，而不是管理咨询。

【天主教】枢机团，枢机主教团，红衣主教团(罗马教皇的咨询机构)
a consultative body
咨询机构
a prudential committee
咨询委员会

在旅客咨询中心，会有一个和蔼可亲而知识渊博的人问候并招待您。
I\'m worried about your condition, you need to get expert advice.
我对你的状况很担心，你应该咨询一下专家的意见。
Please turn your attention to the back of the room, there you will find an information booth and customer representative.
请大家把目光转向屋子的后面，您可以看到我们的咨询台和客户代理人。
You should seek medical advice for that growth.
关于那个肿瘤的问题，你该咨询一下医生。
I think you should ask for a second opinion before your operation.
我认为在你行动前应再咨询一下其他人。
A special phone line was opened up last Tuesday to give free advice.
上周二，开通了一个可以免费咨询的电话专线。
Hello, I would like some information about your room rates please.
你好，我想咨询一下你们的房价信息。

近来，很多夫妇都参加了婚姻咨询。

如果你有会员卡，但是又想咨询我们或者提意见，请把下面的表填一下。

叫你的缴税咨询师把费用算得再精确些。
She is now asking something in the reception desk.
她正在前台咨询一些问题。
to consult sb about sth
就某事向某人咨询

买这台笔记本电脑前，你应该咨询一下专家的建议。

对刚毕业的学生来说，在这样著名的咨询公司工作是个挑战。
The committee made a rational decision through thorough consultation and research.
委员会经过彻底的咨询和研究，作出了明智的决定。
This women\'s support centre provide legal consulting service to victims of domestic violence.
这个妇女救济中心为家庭暴力的受害妇女提供法律咨询。
You can ask the lady at the information for the person you want to contact.
你可以问咨询台的女士是否知道你相联系的人的信息。
The profits in consulting are higher than the profits of a supermarket.
咨询的利润率高于超市的利润率。
If you\'re worried, go to your doctor for advice.
Rúguǒ nǐ yǒusuǒ dānxīn，jiù qù zīxún nǐ de yīshēng。
如果你有所担心，就去咨询你的医生。
You can hire an architect to get advice on digging drains.
Nín kěyǐ pìnqǐng yí wèi jiànzhùshī，xiàng tā zīxún wā páishuǐgōu。
您可以聘请一位建筑师，向他咨询挖排水沟。
He addressed his questions to the nurse in charge.
Tā xiàng zhíbān hùshi zhíjiē zīxúnle jǐgè wèntí。
他向值班护士直接咨询了几个问题。
We will certify payments to the consultants when they have done the work.
Yídàn tāmen wánchéng gōngzuò，wǒmen kě dānbǎo xiàng zīxúnshīmen fùkuǎn。
一旦他们完成工作，我们可担保向咨询师们付款。
The agent then put me on hold while she consulted a colleague.
Ránhòu，zhège tànyuán ràng wǒ zài yìpáng děngzhe，tā qù xiàng yígè tóngliáo zīxún。
然后，这个探员让我在一旁等着，她去向一个同僚咨询。
For further information on drinking, please consult your doctor.
Qǐng xiàng nǐ de yīshēng zīxún gèng duō guānyú yǐnjiǔ de xìnxī。
请向你的医生咨询更多关于饮酒的信息。
He was hired to consult on special issues in the case.
Tā bèi gù lái wèi zhè jiàn ànzi de tèshū wèntí tígōng zīxún。
他被雇来为这件案子的特殊问题提供咨询。
The government is more likely to publish a consultative Green Paper towards the end of the year.
Zhèngfǔ hěn kěnéng zài jīnnián niándǐ chūbǎn yìběn zīxún lǜpíshū。
政府很可能在今年年底出版一本咨询绿皮书。
They have consulted some experts about this construction plan.
Jiù zhè yī jiànshè jìhuà，tāmen yǐ zīxúnle yìxiē zhuānjiā。
就这一建设计划，他们已咨询了一些专家。
Jim wants to enquire about purchasing new computers for his business.
Jímǔ xiǎng jiù wèi shēngyi gòumǎi xīn diànnǎo zīxún yíxià qíngkuàng。
吉姆想就为生意购买新电脑咨询一下情况。
The matter should be left over for the Advisory Committee as already arranged.
Ànzhào shìxiān de ānpái，zhè jiàn shì yīngdāng liúgěi zīxún wěiyuánhuì chǔlǐ。
按照事先的安排，这件事应当留给咨询委员会处理。
When they set up as consultants, they vigorously pursued whatever leads came their way.
Dāng tāmen duìwài xuānchēng shì zīxún zhuānjiā shí，tāmen shénme zhuànqián gàn shénme。
当他们对外宣称是咨询专家时，他们什么赚钱干什么。
The professor consults for industry.
Zhè míng jiàoshòu wèi yèjiè tígōng zīxún。
这名教授为业界提供咨询。
The lawyer counselled me when I was accused of tax fraud.
Dāng wǒ bèikòng piànshuì shí，zhège lǜshī wèi wǒ tígōngle zīxún。
当我被控骗税时，这个律师为我提供了咨询。
You should see a lawyer.
Nǐ yīngdāng zhǎo yí wèi lǜshī zīxún yíxià。
你应当找一位律师咨询一下。
His function was purely consultative.
Tā de gōngzuò wánquán shì zīxún xìng de。
他的工作完全是咨询性的。
Many companies outsource and hire consultants in order to maintain a flexible workforce.
Xǔduō Gōngsī wàibāo hé gùyòng zīxún rényuán，yǐbiàn bǎochí línghuó de láodònglì duìwu。
许多公司外包和雇用咨询人员，以便保持灵活的劳动力队伍。
总统咨文
zǒnɡtǒnɡ zīwén 
presidential message; president\'s message
对于今年的国情咨文，我们的代表要认真讨论。
Duìyú jīnnián de guóqíng zīwén，wǒmen de dàibiǎo yào rènzhēn tǎolùn。
Our delegates should have a careful discussion regarding this years State of the Union Message.

咨询
zīxún
seek advice from; hold counsel with; consult
公司设有专门的问事处，如果有什么问题可以去那里咨询。
Gōngsī shèyǒu zhuānmén de wènshìchù，rúguǒ yǒu shénme wèntí kěyǐ qù nàlǐ zīxún。
There is an enquiry office at the company, you can go there if you have any questions.
我想找个专业的仲裁人咨询一下。
Wǒ xiǎng zhǎo gè zhuānyè de zhòngcáirén zīxún yíxià。
I want to consult a professional arbitrator about this matter.
作为一个新行业，咨询产业正在茁壮成长。
Zuòwéi yígè xīn hángyè，zīxún chǎnyè zhèngzài zhuózhuàng chéngcháng。
The consultation industry is rising and growing strongly.
对于今年的国情咨文，我们的代表要认真讨论。
Duìyú jīnnián de guóqíng zīwén，wǒmen de dàibiǎo yào rènzhēn tǎolùn。
Our delegates should have a careful discussion regarding this years State of the Union Message.
有劳您帮我咨询一下。
Yǒuláo nín bāng wǒ zīxún yíxià。
Could I trouble you to help me make a few enquiries?
咨询
Zīxún
seek advice from
诹访(咨询)
咨诹(询问政事)。
咨询。
咨询。
咨商。
咨议。
法律咨询专页。
咨询工作

网络提供了周到的咨询服务。

People are now talking about business consulting rather than management consulting.

billionaire; multimillionaire

a woman\'s parents-in-law

他已经混成了一个百万富翁了。

He has made his way into the rank of millionaires.
别看我现在穷困潦倒，我家上世可是有名的富翁。

Though I am poor and wretched now, my progenitors were famously wealthy.
你们这么做的结果只能是鹬蚌相争，渔翁得利。

This invention will make you a millionaire.
Zhè xiàng fāmíng néng ràng nǐ chéngwéi bǎiwànfùwēng。
这项发明能让你成为百万富翁。
塞翁失马，安知非福？
Sàiwēngshīmǎ，ānzhīfēifú?
Just like the old frontiersman losing his horse, who knows but that this may be a blessing in disguise?
塞翁失马，安知非福？
Sàiwēngshīmǎ，ānzhīfēifú?
Just like the old frontiersman losing his horse, who knows but that this may be a blessing in disguise?
老翁。
一老翁在河边垂钓
龙钟老翁。
a man of eighty winters
八旬老翁
亿万富翁
yìwàn fùwēng
billionaire; multimillionaire
不要以为卖了几个钱就变富翁了。
Búyào yǐwéi màile jǐgèqián jiù biànfùwēng le。
他已经混成了一个百万富翁了。
Tā yǐjing hùnchéng le yígè bǎiwàn fùwēng le。
He has made his way into the rank of millionaires.
别看我现在穷困潦倒，我家上世可是有名的富翁。
Bié kàn wǒ xiànzài qióngkùnliáodǎo，wǒjiā shàngshì kěshì yǒumíng de fùwēng。
Though I am poor and wretched now, my progenitors were famously wealthy.
百万富翁
bǎiwànfùwēng
millionaire
百万富翁
bǎiwànfùwēng
millionaire
百万富翁
He is reputed to be rich.
他被认为是个富翁。
As a personal trainer to the rich and famous, he earns over a million dollars a year.
作为富翁和名流的私人教练，他每天的收入高达一百多万美元。
The draw could pull in more than $1 billion, creating a new millionaire each week.
该抽奖活动奖项总金额高达十多亿美元，每周都会有一位新的百万富翁诞生。
Becoming a millionaire didn\'t mean an end to his money worries.
成为百万富翁并不意味着他不再被钱困扰。
Do you know about the zillionaire?
你知道这个亿万富翁吗？
He palmed himself off as a zillionaire.
他把自己伪装成亿万富翁。
These days a benevolent billionaire might set up a charitable trust fund.
Zhèxiē tiān，yí wèi lèshànhàoshī de yìwànfùwēng kěnéng huì chénglì yí gè gōngyì xìntuō jījīnhuì。
这些天，一位乐善好施的亿万富翁可能会成立一个公益信托基金会。
I would choose to be a millionaire in a flash.
Wǒ nìngkě zuò duǎnzàn de bǎiwàn fùwēng。
我宁可做短暂的百万富翁。
This invention will make you a millionaire.
Zhè xiàng fāmíng néng ràng nǐ chéngwéi bǎiwànfùwēng。
这项发明能让你成为百万富翁。
不倒翁吱扭吱扭地摇摆着。
Bùdǎowēng zīniǔ zīniǔ de yáobǎizhe。
The self-righting doll is swaying with a creaking sound.
他已经混成了一个百万富翁了。
Tā yǐjing hùnchéng le yígè bǎiwàn fùwēng le。
He has made his way into the rank of millionaires.

millionaire
百万富翁

As a personal trainer to the rich and famous, he earns over a million dollars a year.
作为富翁和名流的私人教练，他每天的收入高达一百多万美元。
The subsistence security standards of other cities are all below 200 yuan, of which Huhhot, Mohe and Yinchuan are the lowest at 143 yuan.
其它城市最低生活保障标准均在200元以下，其中标准最低的是呼和浩特、漠河和银川三市，标准均为143元。
呼和浩特是内蒙古自治区的首府。
Hūhéhàotè shì Nèiménggǔ Zìzhìqū de shǒufǔ。
Huhhot is the capital of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region.
The subsistence security standards of other cities are all below 200 yuan, of which Huhhot, Mohe and Yinchuan are the lowest at 143 yuan.
其它城市最低生活保障标准均在200元以下，其中标准最低的是呼和浩特、漠河和银川三市，标准均为143元。
呼和浩特是内蒙古自治区的首府。
Hūhéhàotè shì Nèiménggǔ Zìzhìqū de shǒufǔ。
Huhhot is the capital of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region.
The subsistence security standards of other cities are all below 200 yuan, of which Huhhot, Mohe and Yinchuan are the lowest at 143 yuan.
其它城市最低生活保障标准均在200元以下，其中标准最低的是呼和浩特、漠河和银川三市，标准均为143元。
浩如烟海
hàorúyānhǎi
vast as the open sea—a tremendous amount (of literature, data, etc.)
我国的史部典籍浩如烟海，我最喜欢读其中的《史记》。
Wǒ guó de shǐbùdiǎnjí hàorúyānhǎi，wǒ zuì xǐhuan dú qí zhōng de《Shǐjì》。
There are a large number of historical records in our country, among which I like Shih Chi best.
中国古典诗歌浩如烟海。
Zhōngguó gǔdiǎnshīgē hàorúyānhǎi。
There are a myriad of Chinese ancient classical poems.
浩如烟海
我国的古典文献浩如烟海。
长江滚滚，水势浩然。
Cháng Jiāng gǔngǔn，shuǐshì hàorán。
The mighty Yangtze river flows rapidly.
他为人正直，身上有种浩然之气。
Tā wéirén zhèngzhí，shēnshàng yǒu zhǒng hàorán zhī qì。
He is an honest person with a noble spirit.
天地皇皇，宇宙浩大，自然中还有很多未知的方面等待我们去探索。
Tiāndì huánghuáng，yǔzhòu hàodà，zìrán zhōng háiyǒu hěnduō wèizhī de fāngmiàn děngdài wǒmen qù tànsuǒ。
The world is insignificant, and the universe vast.  In nature there are still many unknown fields waiting for us to exploit them.
水势浩然。
浩然之气。
浩然正气。
浩气长存
hàoqì chángcún
a noble spirit that will never perish
他为人正直，身上有种浩然之气。
Tā wéirén zhèngzhí，shēnshàng yǒu zhǒng hàorán zhī qì。
He is an honest person with a noble spirit.
浩气永存。
浩气贯长虹。
浩然之气。
浩然正气。
气势浩大
夜晚，他望着浩茫的星空出神。
Yèwǎn，tā wàng zhe hàománg de xīngkōng chūshén。
He was lost in thought, staring at the boundless night sky .
天宇浩茫
浩茫的海域
心事浩茫连广宇
一场惨绝人寰的浩劫
yìcháng cǎnjuérénhuán de hàojié 
a holocaust tragic beyond compare
空前浩劫
kōngqián hàojié
an unheard-of calamity
浩劫
hàojié
great calamity; catastrophe
浩劫。
浩劫
经历一场浩劫。
浩浩荡荡的革命大军
hàohàodàngdàng de gémìngdàjūn
an enormous and powerful revolutionary army; mighty revolutionary contingents
浩浩荡荡的科技大军。
浩浩长江，奔腾不息。
Hàohào Chángjiāng，bēnténgbùxī。
The mighty waters of the Changjiang roll on incessantly.
浩浩荡荡的革命大军
hàohàodàngdàng de gémìngdàjūn
an enormous and powerful revolutionary army; mighty revolutionary contingents
我站在浩浩的江水旁，心潮澎湃。
Wǒ zhànzài hàohào de jiāngshuǐ páng，xīncháopéngpài。
Standing beside the mighty river, I am very thrilled.
望着浩浩的田野，我仿佛回到了故乡。
Wàng zhe hàohào de tiányě，wǒ fǎngfú huídào le gùxiāng。
Staring at the vast field, it seems that have I returned to my birthplace.
浩浩长江奔腾入海。
浩浩苍穹。
浩浩荡荡的科技大军。
浩浩汤汤。
浩繁的开支
hàofán de kāizhī
heavy expenditure
浩繁
hàofán
vast and numerous
在卷帙浩繁的文学宝库中，《红楼梦》是一颗华美宝石。
Zài juànzhì hàofán de wénxué bǎokù zhōng，《Hónglóumèng》 shì yì kē huáměi bǎoshí。
A Dream of Red Mansions is a beautiful gemstone in the vast literature collection.
卷帙浩繁。
数量浩繁，不胜偻指。
工程浩繁
浩繁的开支。
史籍浩繁
浩荡的长江
hàodàng de ChángJiāng
the mighty Changjiang River
东风浩荡。
Dōnɡfēnɡ hàodànɡ。
The east wind blows with mighty power.
浩浩荡荡的革命大军
hàohàodàngdàng de gémìngdàjūn
an enormous and powerful revolutionary army; mighty revolutionary contingents
江面上，舳舻一片浩荡。
Jiāngmiàn shàng，zhúlú yípiàn hàodàng。
The fleet from stem to stern covered a vast area on the surface of the river.
浩荡
浩荡无垠的大海。
军威浩荡
浩浩荡荡的科技大军。
轮船行驶在浩荡的江面上。
工程浩大
gōngchéng hàodà
a gigantic project; a tremendous amount of work
他觉得他的队伍实力坚强，声势浩大。
Tā jué de tā de duìwu shílì jiānqiáng，shēngshì hàodà。
He was confident of the unyielding strength and formidable superiority of his troops.
声势浩大的游行
shēngshì hàodà de yóuxíng
a huge and grand parade
工程浩大，所费不赀。
Gōngchéng hàodà，suǒ fèi bùzī。
The project is on such a gigantic scale that the cost is hard to calculate.
其声势之浩大，威力之猛烈，简直是所向无敌的。
Qí shēngshì zhī hàodà，wēilì zhī měngliè，jiǎnzhí shì suǒ xiàng wúdí de。
Its influence has been so great and its impact so powerful that it is invincible wherever it goes.
这是一项规模浩大的工程。
Zhè shì yí xiàng guīmó hàodà de gōngchéng。
This is a huge project.
天地皇皇，宇宙浩大，自然中还有很多未知的方面等待我们去探索。
Tiāndì huánghuáng，yǔzhòu hàodà，zìrán zhōng háiyǒu hěnduō wèizhī de fāngmiàn děngdài wǒmen qù tànsuǒ。
The world is insignificant, and the universe vast.  In nature there are still many unknown fields waiting for us to exploit them.
因工程浩大，希望各位执事鼎立相助。
Yīn gōngchéng hàodà，xīwàng gè wèi zhíshì dǐnglì xiāngzhù。
As this is a huge project, we hope every attendant would support us with great effort.
浩瀚的大海
hàohàn de dàhǎi
a boundless sea
见到了浩瀚的大海，他的诗情也澎湃起来。
Jiàndào le hàohàn de dàhǎi，tā de shīqíng yě péngpài qǐlái。
Seeing the vast sea, he had a strong desire to write poems.
浩浩荡荡的革命大军
hàohàodàngdàng de gémìngdàjūn
an enormous and powerful revolutionary army; mighty revolutionary contingents
浩大

The crowd was demonstrating tumultuously.
Qúnzhòng zhèngzài jìnxíng shēngshìhàodà de shìwēi yóuxíng。
群众正在进行声势浩大的示威游行。

extensive; wide-embracing

Hàomiǎo de Tài Hú ràng rén xīnqíng shūchàng。

住在烟波浩淼的湖边，你可真会享受 。
Zhùzài yānbō hàomiǎo de húbiān，nǐ kě zhēn huì xiǎngshòu。
Living by the mist-covered waters, you do enjoy yourself.

在火车上打扑克消遣
zài huǒchē shàngdǎ pūkè xiāoqiǎn
beguile the train journey by playing cards
下棋是我喜爱的一种消遣。
Xiàqí shì wǒ xǐ\'ài de yì zhǒng xiāoqiǎn。
Playing chess is one of my favourite pastimes.
大凡一件事的性质由“消遣的”而变为“义务的”，便觉得兴味索然。

We sent an advance scouting party to find the enemy.

我们为了寻找敌军而派遣了一个先遣侦查队。

màidòngshì pēnqì fādòngjī 
pulse-jet engine
巨型喷气式客机
Jet travel is now a commonplace.
现在乘喷气式飞机旅行已是普通事。
the jet age
喷气式飞机时代
Most commercial jets have a service ceiling of about 42,000 feet.
Dàduōshù Shāngyòng pēnqìshì fēijī de shíyòng shēngxiàn zài sìwàn liǎngqiān yīngchǐ zuǒyòu。
大多数商用喷气式飞机的实用升限在四万两千英尺左右。
America\'s jet project was initiated under the tightest possible secrecy.
Měiguó de pēnqìshìfēijī xiàngmù shì zài jí jìn kěnéng mìmì de qíngkuàng xià qǐdòng de。
美国的喷气式飞机项目是在极尽可能秘密地情况下启动的。
He left immediately for the airport, and chartered a jet.
Tā lìjí gǎnwǎngjīchǎng，zūyòngle yí jià pēnqìshìfēijī。
他立即赶往机场，租用了一架喷气式飞机。
A potential 200,000 customers will be jetting off to the United States.
Kěnéng yǒu 20 wàn gùkè huì zuò pēnqìshìfēijī qù Měiguó。
可能有20万顾客会坐喷气式飞机去美国。
I decided to learn how to fly a jumbo jet.
Wǒ juédìng xuéxí jiàshǐ pēnqìshì fēijī。
我决定学习驾驶喷气式飞机。
All of a sudden, a jet plane thundered past the window.
Tūrán，yí jià pēnqìshì fēijī hūxiào de fēiguò chuāngkǒu。
突然，一架喷气式飞机呼啸地飞过窗口。
These big jets are tied to large airports.
Zhèxiē dàxíng pēnqìshì fēijī zhǐnéng zài dàxíng jīchǎng qǐjiàng。
这些大型喷气式飞机只能在大型机场起降。
The faster a jet plane goes the greater its propulsive efficiency.
Pēnqìshìfēijī de sùdù yuè kuài，tāmen de tuījìn xiàolǜ jiù yuè gāo。
喷气式飞机的速度越快，它们的推进效率就越高。
The museum houses a replica of the jet hydroplane that broke the record.
Nàgè bówùguǎn shōucáng yǒu nà jià pòjìlù de pēnqìshì shuǐshàngfēijī de fùzhìpǐn。
那个博物馆收藏有那架破纪录的喷气式水上飞机的复制品。
There are horizontal rotors on a helicopter or compressor rotors in a jet engine.
Zhíshēngfēijī huò pēnqìshì fādòngjī zhōng de yāqìjī zhuànzǐ shàng yǒu shuǐpíng xuányì。
直升飞机或喷气式发动机中的压气机转子上有水平旋翼。

我到底不是科班出身，眼睛挤咕半天，也没有喷薄而出的泪水来应景。
Wǒ dàodǐ búshì kēbān chūshēn，yǎnjīng jǐgū bàntiān，yě méiyǒu pēnbó érchū de lèishuǐ lái yìngjǐng。
After all, I didn\'t major in acting. No tears came out of my eyes in spite of the fact that I blinked for so long.
喷涌而出的温泉水暗示人们：这地下有热能。
Pēnyǒng érchū de wēnquánshuǐ ànshì rénmen：zhè dexià yǒu rènéng。

Kōngqì wén qǐlái yǒu gǔ méiyān de wèi，xiàng nóngwù yìbān nónghòu。
空气闻起来有股煤烟的味，像浓雾一般浓厚。
Coal,petroleum and natural gas are fossil fuels．
煤、石油、天然气是矿物燃料。
In later years when the bog is drained, the peat can be dug out and used as fuel.
Zài guò jǐnián，dāng zhǎozé gānhé zhīhòu，níméi kěyǐ wāchūlái yòngzuò ránliào。
再过几年，当沼泽干涸之后，泥煤可以挖出来用作燃料。
The landscape unit drawn diagrammatically illustrates the gentle rolling relief, with a peat-filled basin.
Huìzhì de dìxíng dānyuántú gàilüè de chǎnmíngle zhège qǐfú héhuǎn de dìmào —— qízhōng dàiyǒu yí gè fùhán níméi de péndì。
绘制的地形单元图概略地阐明了这个起伏和缓的地貌——其中带有一个富含泥煤的盆地。
我用了一下午的时间把煤末做成了这些煤饼。
Wǒ yòng le yíxiàwǔ de shíjiān bǎ méimò zuòchéng le zhèxiē méibǐng。
It took me a whole afternoon to make this coal dust into coal cakes.
他把煤饼搬走了，地下只剩下一层煤末。
Tā bǎ méibǐng bānzǒu le，dìxià zhǐ shèngxià yì céng méimò。
He moved the coal cakes away, and there was only coal dust left on the floor.
作为照明工具，电灯相对于煤油灯有很多优点。
Zuòwéi zhàomíng gōngjù，diàndēng xiāngduìyú méiyóudēng yǒu hěnduō yōudiǎn。
As a lighting tool, the electric lamp has more advantages than a paraffin lamp.
探险队员每人都随身携带一个小煤油炉。
Tànxiǎnduìyuán měi rén dōu suíshēn xiédài yígè xiǎo méiyóulú。
Every member of the expedition took a small paraffin stove.
煤油炉
méiyóulú
paraffin (英) {或} kerosene (美) stove
我公司的煤黑油产量居全省之首。
Wǒ gōngsī de méihēiyóu chǎnliàng jū quánshěng zhī shǒu。
Our company ranks first in the output of coal tar.
煤炭、石油等常规能源的价值应当得到进一步的发掘。

zhòngméiqì 
be gassed

The leaking of a gas pipe can easily cause an explosion.
我家煤气灶的炉嘴儿该换一个了。

一定要严防由于煤炉泄露造成的煤气中毒。

We should take strict precautions against gas poisoning caused by coal stove leaks.

He is used to carrying gas lamps and patrolling the yard every night.

这个村子几乎每户人家都安装了煤气灶。

Consumption of coal went down by 5%.

He is already the general engineer of this low BTU water gas project.

这些煤足够装满十辆斗子车。

小时候，他经常到这个地方捡乏煤。

He came here to collect incompletely burned coal when he was a little boy.

The cost of nuclear power is lower than that of coal power.
这个火筷子做的太短了，取煤的时候很容易烫到手！
Zhège huǒkuàizi zuò de tài duǎn le，qǔméi de shíhou hěnróngyì tàng dào shǒu！
This pair of fire tongs is too short. One might burn one\'s hands while fetching coal!
用这个火钳夹煤一点也不困难，顺手得很。
Yòng zhège huǒqián jiáméi yìdiǎn yě bú kùnnan，shùnshǒu de hěn。
It\'s very convenient to use this pair of fire-tongs to hold coal.
工人们在对这些煤进行高温结焦。
Gōngrénmen zài duì zhèxiē méi jìnxíng gāowēn jiéjiāo。
The workers are coking the coals at elevated temperatures.
这个村子已经改用坑气来替代煤烧饭了。
Zhège cūnzi yǐjing gǎiyòng kēngqì lái tìdài méi shāofàn le。
Marsh gas has been supplied to the village instead of coal gas.
烧锅炉还是需要块煤的，再买些吧。

The leaking of a gas pipe can easily cause an explosion.
我家煤气灶的炉嘴儿该换一个了。
Wǒjiā méiqìzào de lúzuǐr gāi huàn yígè le。
The furnace mouth of my gas cooker should be replaced.
我公司的煤黑油产量居全省之首。

Our company ranks first in the output of coal tar.

He is used to carrying gas lamps and patrolling the yard every night.

这个村子几乎每户人家都安装了煤气灶。

(of writing) easy and smooth

从外观看，塑像的线条很流畅。
你这一说，我心里宽畅多了。
面对大海，人们的心情怎么能不开畅呢？
Miànduì dàhǎi，rénmen de xīnqíng zěnme néng bùkāichàng ne？
Facing the vast sea, how can one not feel free from worry?
开怀畅饮
kāihuái chàngyǐn
drink (alcohol) to one\'s heart\'s content; go on a drinking spree
中秋佳节，让我们大家开怀畅饮吧！
Zhōngqiū jiājié，ràng wǒmen dàjiā kāihuái chàngyǐn ba！
Let\'s go carousing during this Mid-autumn Festival!
联欢会上大家开怀畅饮，尽情欢娱。
Liánhuānhuì shàng dàjiā kāihuái chàngyǐn，jìnqíng huānyú。
During the get-together every one drank to their hearts\' content, and had fun as much as they liked.
宴会上，大家开怀畅饮。
Yànhuì shàng，dàjiā kāihuái chàngyǐn.
At the dinner party everyone drank to their heart\'s content.
胸怀开畅。
和几位相知开怀畅饮。
我们一定要保证公司的货源充畅。
Wǒmen yídìng yào bǎozhèng gōngsī de huòyuán chōngchàng。
We must make sure that the supply of goods in our company is sufficient and smooth.
他写起文章思如泉涌，行文充畅。
Tā xiě qǐ wénzhāng sīrú quányǒng，xíngwén chōngchàng。
His written ideas have both rich content, and smooth style.
货源充畅，购销两旺。
文气充畅。
开怀畅饮
kāihuái chàngyǐn
drink (alcohol) to one\'s heart\'s content; go on a drinking spree
中秋佳节，让我们大家开怀畅饮吧！
Zhōngqiū jiājié，ràng wǒmen dàjiā kāihuái chàngyǐn ba！
Let\'s go carousing during this Mid-autumn Festival!
宾主酬酢，举杯畅饮。
Bīnzhǔ chóuzuò，jǔbēi chàngyǐn。
The host and guests toasted to each other, and drank to their hearts content.
联欢会上大家开怀畅饮，尽情欢娱。

chàngyǐn
drink one\'s fill

畅销书未必都好，有些不过是有名无实。

这本介绍中国共产党党史的书很畅销。

This book introducing the history of the Chinese Communist Party is selling well.
这本书很畅销，改年还得再版。

《论语别裁》这本书在网上很畅销。

A Selection of the Analects sells many copies on the internet.
张教授写了一本书《亚健康初探》，还很畅销。

这本书很畅销

Bìngrén de hūxī jiànjiàn shùnchàng le。

bǎozhàng chéngxiāng wùzī de shùnchàng jiāoliú

dàbiàn tōngchàng

xiǎochànɡ yīnlǜ

wénbǐ xiǎochànɡ

yìwài shūchànɡ

liúchàng
(of writing) easy and smooth

水使岩石上的矿物质重新沉淀。
Coal,petroleum and natural gas are fossil fuels．
煤、石油、天然气是矿物燃料。
Scientist analyzed the rock sample collected from the moon to see what minerals it contains.
科学家仔细检查了月球上的石块样品，研究其含有什么矿物质。
The coal miners attained a 40 carat diamond in the mine.
Méikuàng gōngrén zài kuàngjǐng zhōng yìwài fāxiànle yì kē 40 kèlā de zuànshí。
煤矿工人在矿井中意外发现了一颗40克拉的钻石。
Billy promised to give this miner twenty thousand dollars stake because he found the 150 karat diamond.
比利承诺要给这个采矿人两万美元，因为他找到了150克拉的钻石。

Tā chū dào kuàngshān shí，chùchù juéde xīnqí。
When he first got to the mine, everything struck him as new.

The sound of hammers and drills made a symphony in the mine.

The mine streched three miles into an ore bed.

The mining company wants to excavate the hillside.

这种矿泉壶很实用，用它过滤后，水就可以直接喝了。

Asphaltum is a brownish-black solid or semisolid mixture of bitumens obtained from native deposits or as a petroleum byproduct, used in paving, roofing, and waterproofing.
沥青，是一种黑褐色固体或半固体沥青混合物，采自天然矿藏或是石油的副产品，用于铺路，封屋顶和防水。
The average daily throughput was 1, 370 tons of ore in 1999.
1999年的日平均产量为一千三百七十吨矿砂。
Mining is now the second most dangerous industry in the world.

bedded deposit

(ore) reserves

拥有丰富的矿藏
yōngyǒu fēngfù de kuàngcáng

这一带的矿体，宝石蕴藏量很丰富。

Our country is rich in mineral resources.
我们这个地方蕴藏着十分丰富的银矿资源。

Our district is rich in silver mines.
矿藏
森林、矿藏为全民公有，任何个人不准侵占

过度开采地下矿藏容易诱发地质灾害。

Asphaltum is a brownish-black solid or semisolid mixture of bitumens obtained from native deposits or as a petroleum byproduct, used in paving, roofing, and waterproofing.
沥青，是一种黑褐色固体或半固体沥青混合物，采自天然矿藏或是石油的副产品，用于铺路，封屋顶和防水。
America has a large quantity of mineral deposits.
Měiguó fùhán kuàngcáng。
美国富含矿藏。
This is the largest known diamond load.
Zhè shì rénmen suǒ zhī de zuìdà de zuànshí kuàngcáng。
这是人们所知的最大的钻石矿藏。
矿工们正在用电镐开采矿石。
Kuànggōngmen zhèngzài yòng diàngǎo kāicǎi kuàngshí。
Miners are mining ores with electric picks.
在矿场上一定要注意矿工的安全！
Zài kuàngchǎng shàng yídìng yào zhùyì kuànggōng de ānquán！
People should ensure the safety of the miners in the minining industry.
他们在矿上开采出了一些石灰质矿石。
Tāmen zài kuàngshàng kāicǎi chū le yìxiē shíhuīzhì kuàngshí。
They extracted some calcium carbonate ores in the mine.
不知道这个矿井的铜矿储量是多少。
Bùzhīdào zhège kuàngjǐng de tóngkuàng chǔliàng shì duōshǎo。
I\'m wondering how much copper reserves there are in this mine.
这是座共生矿，我们可以一次获取多种矿石。
Zhè shì zuò gòngshēngkuàng，wǒmen kěyǐ yícì huòqǔ duōzhǒng kuàngshí。
This is a paragenesis, we can get various minerals at one time.
煤矿主不顾矿工的死活，让他们没日没夜地工作。
Méikuàng zhǔ búgù kuànggōng de sǐhuó，ràng tāmen méirìméiyè de gōngzuò。
The mine manager didn\'t care at all about his employees\' safety and made them work day and night.

这些丰富的矿藏，是大自然给我们的恩泽！

Abundant mineral resources are bounties bestowed by nature.

矿工们下到坑井里工作是很辛苦的。

This kind of water kettle is very practical because water can be drunk directly after its filtration.

每个队员都配备了这种小型的铁矿石探测器。

The mine pit caved in, and the workers escaped via the air vent.

This ore assays high in gold.

Miners gathered in a show of support for the government.

Scientist analyzed the rock sample collected from the moon to see what minerals it contains.
科学家仔细检查了月球上的石块样品，研究其含有什么矿物质。
The new technique increases the efficiency of longwall panel mining.
这种新技术提高了长壁盘区采矿的效率。
The sea is the world\'s greatest thesaurus of minerals and food.
海洋是世界上最大的矿物和食物宝库。
The average daily throughput was 1, 370 tons of ore in 1999.
1999年的日平均产量为一千三百七十吨矿砂。
They should ventilate the galleries of a coal-mine.
他们应该使煤矿坑道通风。
Asphaltum is a brownish-black solid or semisolid mixture of bitumens obtained from native deposits or as a petroleum byproduct, used in paving, roofing, and waterproofing.
沥青，是一种黑褐色固体或半固体沥青混合物，采自天然矿藏或是石油的副产品，用于铺路，封屋顶和防水。
The development of main mineral processing technologies of wolframite and scheelite are presented in the paper.
论文分别介绍了黑、白钨选矿工艺主要技术进展情况。
The xylem is a system confined to the transport of mineral elements.
木质部是一种专门用来运输矿物元素的系统。
The characteristics of small faults are coarctation and zonation with clear direction.
小断层具有密集成带的特点，且方向性明显，成为影响煤矿生产的主要地质因素。
Some coal mines had to shut down.
有些煤矿不得不关闭。
A deposit of coal has been found in the basin area.
在这个盆地地区发现了煤矿层。
Mining is now the second most dangerous industry in the world.
Cǎikuàng shì dāngjīn Shìjiè dì\'èr dà zuì wēixiǎn chǎnyè。
采矿是当今世界第二大最危险产业。
America has a large quantity of mineral deposits.
Měiguó fùhán kuàngcáng。
美国富含矿藏。
It seems definite now that the gold deposits here have commercial potential.

这里的金矿具有商业价值似乎已经非常明确了。

The drift to the mine was blocked off.

矿井的水平巷道被堵塞了。

躺在矿盐浴中使你的皮肤感觉非常柔和。
They will battle for the gold medal.

A steam locomotive is still used in the coal mines here.

这里煤矿仍然在使用蒸汽机车。

The horse has a mineral lick which she will not touch.

拥有丰富的矿藏

这些丰富的矿藏，是大自然给我们的恩泽！

我们这个地方蕴藏着十分丰富的银矿资源。

地下蕴含着丰富的铁矿。

中国矿藏丰富。

China is rich in mineral resources.
这个山区附近的地矿资源非常丰富。
Zhège shānqū fùjìn de dìkuàng zīyuán fēicháng fēngfù。
The vicinity of mountainous area is rich in geological minerals.
这一带的矿体，宝石蕴藏量很丰富。
Zhè yídài de kuàngtǐ，bǎoshí yùncángliàng hěnfēngfù。
The mineral deposit in the area is rich in gems.
从探矿的资料看是个富矿。
拥有丰富的矿产资源。
海底蕴藏着丰富的矿物资源。
我国西部地区富产多种矿物。
矿藏丰富
America has a large quantity of mineral deposits.
Měiguó fùhán kuàngcáng。
美国富含矿藏。
The speaker emphasized that much of South Africa\'s importance lays in its mineral wealth.
发言人强调，南非的重要性很大程度上在于其矿产丰富。
If you struck oil, you could be as rich him.
Rúguǒ nǐ fāxiànle yóukuàng，nǐ jiù néng xiàng tā nàme fùyǒu。
如果你发现了油矿，你就能像他那么富有。
各个厂矿
gè gè chǎngkuàng
each factory and mine
选矿厂
xuǎnkuàngchǎng
ore dressing plant; concentration plant
这个工厂主要是对铁矿石进行锻冶。
Zhège gōngchǎng zhǔyào shì duì tiěkuàngshí jìnxíng duànyě。
It is a factory with the main function of forging iron ore.
我厂不仅开采煤矿，还加工各种煤坯产品。
Wǒ chǎng bùjǐn kāicǎi méikuàng，hái jiāgōng gèzhǒng méipī chǎnpǐn。
Our company not only exploits coal mines, but also processes all kinds of coal products.
采矿工业
cǎikuànggōngyè 
mining (industry)
按自己的意愿，选择了采矿专业。
Mining employs fewer men now．
采矿业现在雇工比较少。
This is a very small selection of true stories and anecdotes about disasters in the mining industry.
Zhè shì yì běn yǒuguān cǎikuàng yè zāinàn de zhēnshí gùshi hé yìshì de jīngxuǎnjí。
这是一本有关采矿业灾难的真实故事和轶事的精选集。
Mining is now the second most dangerous industry in the world.

采矿是当今世界第二大最危险产业。

要是开采工作启动了，当地人会因为矿场离他们太近而不悦。

采矿工程
cǎikuànggōngchéng
mining engineering
采矿工业
cǎikuànggōngyè 
mining (industry)
土木 (机械，电机，采矿)工程
Tǔmù（jīxiè，diànjī，cǎikuàng）gōngchéng。
civil (mechanical, electrical, mining) engineering
矿工们正在用电镐开采矿石。
Kuànggōngmen zhèngzài yòng diàngǎo kāicǎi kuàngshí。
Miners are mining ores with electric picks.
禁止不经批准随意采挖矿藏。

Random mining is prohibited.

他们在矿上开采出了一些石灰质矿石。

砂矿开采
shākuàngkāicǎi
placer mining; alluvial mining; placering
露天矿的采集危险相对较小。

Opencast mining is relatively safer.

Large mining claims are segregated into smaller claims.

Local people have been mining coal here since the sixteenth century.

当地人从16世纪开始就在这儿开采煤矿。
Asphaltum is a brownish-black solid or semisolid mixture of bitumens obtained from native deposits or as a petroleum byproduct, used in paving, roofing, and waterproofing.
沥青，是一种黑褐色固体或半固体沥青混合物，采自天然矿藏或是石油的副产品，用于铺路，封屋顶和防水。
Copper, lead and zinc were mined in the centre and north of the country.
Zài zhège guójiā de zhōngbù hé běibù kāicǎi chū le tóng、qiān、xīnkuàng。
在这个国家的中部和北部开采出了铜、铅、锌矿。
The gold was exhausted from the mine.
Jīnzi cóng kuàngshí zhōng kāicǎi chūlái。
金子从矿石中开采出来。
With the help of a geologist, he mined for salt and coal, water and mercury.

The betters have been waging money on this game for months.

He stays in the gambling den all day, he doesn\'t go to work.

He was blamed by his teacher and assured him that he won\'t go to gambling casino again.
这个赌场每天能收到大约十万元的头钱。

This casino can receive a cut of around 100,000 yuan every day.
赌场里都是吆五喝六的，你别去凑热闹了。

It is illegal to gather a crowd in order to gamble. We must take strong measures against this.
他因为赌博进了局子，真是罪有应得。

He was arrested and sent to jail for gambling, and he deserved the punishment.
他赌博输的钱老鼻子了，但还是恶习不改。

他嫖娼赌博，不是个好人！

这个犯罪团伙以赌博的方式，设局骗了不少人。

This criminal band set many traps to cheat people through gambling.
他习染上了赌博，最终输掉了全部家产。

He became gambling addict, and lost all his possessions.
由于屡次赌博，他被处以行政拘留三天的处罚！
Yóuyú lǚcì dǔbó，tā bèi chǔyǐ xíngzhèng jūliú sāntiān de chǔfá！
Due to gambling, he was punished for a three-day administrative detention.
染上赌博的恶习将贻害无穷。
Rǎnshàng dǔbó de èxí jiāng yíhài wúqióng。
Getting into the bad habit of gambling will bring continuous evil consequences.

赌博恶习不改，家无宁日。
a hot streak in gambling
赌博中接连不断的走运
to put a lid on gambling

你赌博最多赢过多少钱？
a betting/outdoors man
好赌博/户外活动的人

查克因赌博失去了妻子，现在他负债累累。
Peter\'s excess drinking and gambling completely ruined his life.
彼得无节制的喝酒赌博完全毁了他的生活。
Ruth is forever complaining about her husband\'s gambling problem.
路德总是抱怨他丈夫的赌博毛病。
Gambling nearly tore the family apart.
赌博差点让这个家四分五裂。
Gambling can be a real expense for someone who loses all the time.
有些人会把所有时间都花在赌博上。
Gambling is a vice that I am happy I don\'t have.
我很高兴自己没有赌博的恶习。
Are playing against each other or the bank?
Dǔbó zhōng tāmen shì xiānghù duìkàng yíng duìfāng de qián háishì dōu duìkàng zhuāngjiā yíng zhuāngjiā de qián？
赌博中他们是相互对抗赢对方的钱还是都对抗庄家赢庄家的钱？
Some say gambling adds spice to their lives.
Yǒu rén shuō dǔbó néng zēngjiā shēnghuó de qíngqù。
有人说赌博能增加生活的情趣。
He has lost all of his wealth through gambling.
Zài dǔbó zhōng tā shīqùle suǒyǒu de cáichǎn。
在赌博中他失去了所有的财产。
Being a game of chance rather than skill, the contest was basically a gambling activity.
Yóuyú shì gè kào yùnqi ér fēi jìshù qǔshèng de yóuxì， gāi jìngsài jīběnshàng shì yí gè dǔbó huódòng。
由于是个靠运气而非技术取胜的游戏，该竞赛基本上是一个赌博活动。
I chuck about my money in a gambling machine every time I go to the casino.
Měiyícì wǒ qù dǔchǎng，wǒ dōu zài dǔbójī shàng huīhuò wǒ de qián。
每一次我去赌场，我都在赌博机上挥霍我的钱。
Only thing I gamble on is poker，no limit hold.
Wǒ wéiyī wán de dǔbó jiùshì pūkè，wúxiàn xiàzhù de nà zhǒng。
我唯一玩的赌博就是扑克，无限下注的那种。
He was in and will play for the entire jackpot.
Tā wèi zhěnggè dàjiǎng zài dǔbó。
他为整个大奖在赌博。
He kissed off his bad luck and started to gamble.
Tā shěqìle tā de huài yùnqi， kāishǐ dǔbó。
他舍弃了他的坏运气，开始赌博。
He resolved to leave off gaming.
Tā juéxīn jièdiào dǔbó。
他决心戒掉赌博。
Simply don\'t blame me if you lose your shirt with that gamble.
Rúguǒ yīnwèi dǔbó，nǐ shīqùle quánbù cáichǎn，búyào guài wǒ。
如果因为赌博，你失去了全部财产，不要怪我。
This gaming system really seems like the thin end of the wedge.
Zhège dǔbó xìtǒng zhēn xiàngshì yùshìle zuìhòu de jiéguǒ。
这个赌博系统真像是预示了最后的结果。
Collusion resulted in tax fixes for gamblers.
Chuàntōng wǔbì dǎozhìle duì dǔbózhě de miǎnshuì。
串通舞弊导致了对赌博者的免税。
The election was just a lottery to them.
Zhè chǎng xuǎnjǔ duì tāmen láishuō jiùxiàng yì chǎng dǔbó。
这场选举对他们来说就像一场赌博。
The local Mafia won\'t touch gambling.
Běndì hēishǒudǎng bù cānyù dǔbó。
本地黑手党不参与赌博。
His main pastime is gambling.
Tā de zhǔyào xiāoqiǎn shì dǔbó。
他的主要消遣是赌博。
The toughs and blades of the city hoot and bang their drums, drink arak, play dice, and dance.
Zhè zuò chéngshì de ègùn hé hùnhùn chéngtiān àn lǎba、qiāo gǔ、xùjiǔ、dǔbó、tiàowǔ。
这座城市的恶棍和混混成天按喇叭、敲鼓、酗酒、赌博、跳舞。
He has a perfect gambling system at roulette.
Tā zài lúnpándǔ fāngmiàn yǒu yítào wánměi de dǔbó jìqiǎo。
他在轮盘堵方面有一套完美的赌博技巧。
His gambling cost him a fortune.

It is a purely speculative gamble.
zhè shì chúncuì de tóujī dǔbó。

愿赌服输，赌输了就一定要被罚酒。
Yuàndŭfúshū，dŭshūle jiù yídìng yào bèi fájiǔ。
警察没收了所有的赌资和赌具。
Jǐngchá mòshōu le suǒyǒu de dǔzī hé dǔjù。
The police confiscated all the gambling money and gambling equipment.
我敢打赌他明天准来。

Nàxiē dǔchǎng shàng shū le de rén dōu xiǎng bānběnr。
All gamblers on a losing streak want to get their money back by continuing to gamble.
他因参赌而被捕。
Tā yīn cān dǔ ér bèibǔ。
He was arrested for gambling.
他被师傅臭骂了一顿，保证再也不去赌场了。
Tā bèi shīfu chòumà le yídùn，bǎozhèngzài yě búqù dǔchǎng le。
He was blamed by his teacher and assured him that he won\'t go to gambling casino again.
她的丈夫吃喝嫖赌无所不为，她总是暗自垂泪却没有办法。

Although her husband is as wicked as possible, she could do nothing but weep secretly all the time.
他好赌成性，把家产都卖光了，有粗砺充饥已经不错了。

After gambling became second nature, he sold out all the family property. Having only unpolished rice to allay hunger is pretty good for him.

Lāsīwéijiāsī shì quánshìjiè zhùmíng de dǔchéng。

咱们就以这场球赛的胜负来赌东道。

Let\'s bet on the final result of the match.
这个赌鬼把自己的财产输掉了一大半。
Zhège dǔguǐ bǎ zìjǐ de cáichǎn shūdiào le yídàbàn。
The addicted gambler lost more than half of his wealth to gambling.
他整天都待在赌窝里，也不去上班了。
Tā zhěngtiān dōu dài zài dǔwō lǐ，yě bùqù shàngbān le。
He stays in the gambling den all day, he doesn\'t go to work.
你的赌瘾太大了！
Nǐ de dǔyǐn tài dà le！
You are really addicted to gambling!
你老想着翻本儿，只会越赌越输。
Nǐ lǎo xiǎng zhe fānběnr，zhǐ huì yuè dǔ yuè shū。
If you keep thinking of winning back what you have lost, you will lose more.
会众赌博是违法行为，要严厉打击。
Huìzhòng dǔbó shì wéifǎ xíngwéi，yào yánlì dǎjī。
It is illegal to gather a crowd in order to gamble. We must take strong measures against this.
他因为赌博进了局子，真是罪有应得。
Tā yīnwèi dǔbó jìn le júzi，zhēnshì zuìyǒu yīngdé。
He was arrested and sent to jail for gambling, and he deserved the punishment.
他赌博输的钱老鼻子了，但还是恶习不改。
Tā dǔbó shū de qián lǎobízi le，dàn háishi èxí bùgǎi。
He still indulges in gambling, though he has lost plenty of money.
他嫖娼赌博，不是个好人！
Tā piáochāng dǔbó，búshì gè hǎorén！
He visits prostitutes and gambles, he is not a good man.
这个犯罪团伙以赌博的方式，设局骗了不少人。

This criminal band set many traps to cheat people through gambling.
他好赌成性，家中已经让他输得所剩无几了。
Tā hàodǔ chéngxìng，jiā zhōng yǐjing ràng tā shū de suǒshèng wújǐ le。
He is addicted to gambling, and has lost almost everything in his home.
头家每天可以从赌徒身上捞到不少钱。
Tóujiā měitiān kěyǐ cóng dǔtú shēnshàng lāodào bùshǎo qián。
In gambling, the person who takes a percentage of the kitty can earn a great deal of money from gamblers.
这个赌场每天能收到大约十万元的头钱。

This casino can receive a cut of around 100,000 yuan every day.
他习染上了赌博，最终输掉了全部家产。

He became gambling addict, and lost all his possessions.
由于屡次赌博，他被处以行政拘留三天的处罚！

Due to gambling, he was punished for a three-day administrative detention.
赌场里都是吆五喝六的，你别去凑热闹了。

The casinos are full of people who are calling out numbers, it\'s noisy, don\'t go there.

他嗜赌成性，最后输光了自己的祖产。

Gambling became second nature to him, and he finally lost his ancestral estate.
他因赌博罪，被判十二年有期徒刑。

He was sentenced to twelve years in prison for committing the crime of gambling.
他决心放弃赌博。

Tā yǐjīng jīnpílìjìn le，bùnéng zài jìxù zhè chǎng bùkěnéng de，túláo de zhànzhēng。
她已经筋疲力尽了，不能再继续这场不可能的，徒劳的战争。
一连几天熬夜加班，使他疲困不堪。
Yìlián jǐtiān áoyè jiābān，shǐ tā píkùn bùkān。
Staying up all night and working overtime for several days made him feel exhausted.
近来股市有些疲困，个股只跌不涨。
Jìnlái gǔshì yǒuxiē píkùn，gè gǔ zhǐdiē bùzhǎng。
Recently, the stock market is sluggish, shares of individual companies have dropped and haven\'t gone up.
忙了一天，很疲困。
疲困不振。
疲乏

His body was in rebellion against fatigue.
Tā de shēntǐ búshèngpífá。
他的身体不胜疲乏。
