他父亲的眉头皱到一起，眼里闪着怒火。
This fabric won\'t wrinkle.
Zhè zhǒng zhīwù bù qǐzhòu。
这种织物不起皱。
她沉默着皱一皱眉头，露出一股极为憎厌的神情。
Tā chénmò zhe zhòuyizhòu méitou，lòuchū yìgǔ jíwéi zēngyàn de shénqíng。
Silently she frowned with a look of utter distaste.
他看见有人吐痰，皱了皱眉头。
Tā kànjiàn yǒurén tǔ tán，zhòu le zhòu méitou。
He frowned with displeasure when he saw someone spit.
听了我的问题，他皱了皱眉头，没有答言。
Tīng le wǒ de wèntí，tā zhòu le zhòu méitóu，méiyǒu dáyán。
After listening to my question he just frowned, and said nothing.
他寻思了半天，眉头一皱，计上心来。
Tā xúnsi le bàntiān，méitóu yí zhòu，jì shàngxīn lái。
He thought to himself for a while. He knit his brows heavily and at last a plan was born in his heart.
他眉头一皱，计上心头，立刻就想出了解决问题的方法。
Tā méitóu yí zhòu，jì shàng xīntóu，lìkè jiù xiǎngchūle jiějué wèntí de fāngfǎ。
He knitted his brows and a solution suddenly came to mind.
皱着眉头。
皱着眉头思索。

He was frowning. It seemed that he had something on his mind.

He will frown down on his wishes.

Tā de zhòuméi zuìzhōng biànchéngle wēixiào。

His face creased up and the vacant blue eyes clouded over.
Tā de liǎn zhòubaba de，kōngdòng de lán yǎnjing bùmǎnle wūyún。
他的脸皱巴巴的，空洞的蓝眼睛布满了乌云。
His father\'s brows drew together and his eyes flashed with anger.
Tā fùqīn de méitóu zhòu dào yìqǐ，Yǎn lǐ shǎnzhe nùhuǒ。
他父亲的眉头皱到一起，眼里闪着怒火。
He appeared to ignore her sarcasm，his brows drawn together in a frown.
Tā kànsì duì tā de fěngcì búxièyígù，kě méitóu què zhòule qǐlái。
他看似对她的讽刺不屑一顾，可眉头却皱了起来。
He frowned his disapproval at her.
Tā duì tā zhòuméi，biǎodále fǒudìng de yìsi。
他对她皱眉，表达了否定的意思。
He will frown down on his wishes.
Tā huì zhòuméi yāzhìzhù zìjǐ de xīwàng。
他会皱眉压制住自己的希望。
His frown turned into a smile.
Tā de zhòuméi zuìzhōng biànchéngle wēixiào。
他的皱眉最终变成了微笑。
They usually look straight through me with a frown，as I didn\'t even exist.
Tāmen zǒngshì zhòuméi chénsī，duì wǒ shì\'érbújiàn，hǎoxiàng wǒ gēnběn bù cúnzài yíyàng。
他们总是皱眉沉思，对我视而不见，好像我根本不存在一样。
Ironing gets rid of most wrinkles.
Yùndǒu yùnpíngle dàbùfèn de zhězhòu。
熨斗熨平了大部分的褶皱。
She had her eyebrows threaded.
Tā zhòuqǐle méitóu。
她皱起了眉头。
This fabric won\'t wrinkle.
Zhè zhǒng zhīwù bù qǐzhòu。
这种织物不起皱。
The dress got wrinkled.
Zhè jiàn yīfu zhòu le。
这件衣服皱了。
Sorrow had lined his face.
Bēitòng shǐ tā de liǎnshàng liúxiàle zhòuwén。
悲痛使他的脸上留下了皱纹。
His face has many lines.
Tā liǎn shàng yǒu xǔduō zhòuwén。
他脸上有许多皱纹。
Thinking always made him frown.
Tā yì sīkǎo jiùyào zhòuméi。
他一思考就要皱眉。
He was wrinkled and ungroomed，with a two-day beard.
Tā zhòuwén mǎnmiàn，bùxiūbiānfú，húzi dōu liǎng tiān wèi guā le。
他皱纹满面，不修边幅，胡子都两天未刮了。
She adjusted the drape of her skirt.
Tā zhěnglezhěng zìjǐ qúnzi shàng de zhězhòu。
她整了整自己裙子上的褶皱。
He looked at her frowningly.
Tā zhòuzhe méitóu kànzhe tā。
他皱着眉头看着她。
His cheeks were unlined.
Tā de liǎnshàng méiyǒu zhòuwén。
他的脸上没有皱纹。
Wrinkles crisscrossed her face.
Zhòuwén bùmǎn tā de liǎnpáng。
皱纹布满她的脸庞。
Their lined faces were immeasurably sad.
Tāmen nà zhǎngmǎn zhòuwén de liǎnshàng dàizhe wúxiàn de yōushāng。
他们那长满皱纹的脸上带着无限的忧伤。
随着时间的流失，父母脸上出现了折皱。
Suí zhe shíjiān de liúshī，fùmǔ liǎnshàng chūxiàn le zhézhòu。
With the passage of time, there are wrinkles on his parents\' faces.
我多么想抚平奶奶脸上的皱折。
Wǒ duōme xiǎng fǔpíng nǎinai liǎnshàng de zhòuzhé。
How I wish that I could smooth the wrinkles on grandma\'s face.
你这样粗心，会把文件皱折坏的！
Nǐ zhèyàng cūxīn，huì bǎ wénjiàn zhòuzhé huài de！
You are so careless that you may crumple the document.
这种合成纤维折叠以后也不起皱。
Zhèzhǒng héchéng xiānwéi zhédié yǐhòu yě bù qǐzhòu。
This synthetic fabric won\'t crumple when folded.
眼角的皱折已经很深了。
衣服皱折成这样了。
注意别把地图弄皱了。
Zhùyì bié bǎ dìtú nòngzhòu le。
Mind you don\'t crumple the map.
A dirty copy was sitting in the director\'s chair.
Yí fèn nòngzhòu de wéngǎo zhèng fàngzài zhǔguǎn de yǐzi shàng。
一份弄皱的文稿正放在主管的椅子上。
She creased up her shirt by putting it in her small bag.
Tā bǎ chènyī fàngjìn xiǎo bāo lǐ，nòng zhòu le。
她把衬衣放进小包里,弄皱了。
气得涨红了脸
qì de zhànghóng le liǎn 
redden (or flush) with anger
证券交易所的红盘显示，股指略有上涨。
Zhèngquàn jiāoyìsuǒ de hóngpán xiǎnshì，gǔzhǐ lüèyǒu shàngzhǎng。
The red digital in the stock exchange indicates that the stock index has risen slightly.
脸涨得通红。
He blazed with anger for his wife\'s unfaithfulness.
Yīnwèi qīzǐ de bùzhōng， tā qì de zhànghóngle liǎn。
因为妻子的不忠，他气得涨红了脸。
He checked his cries, going red in the face with effort.
Tā yìzhì zhù le kūqì，liǎn yīnwèi yònglì zhàng de tōnghóng。
他抑制住了哭泣，脸因为用力涨的通红。
通货一膨胀，物价就涨，水涨船高嘛。
Tōnghuò yì péngzhàng，wùjià jiù zhǎng，shuǐzhǎngchuángāo ma。
Prices rise in proportion to inflation, like boats going up with the level of the water.
水位不断上涨，洪水已经从堤坝上漫流出来了。
Shuǐwèi búduàn shàngzhǎng，hóngshuǐ yǐjing cóng dībà shàng mànliú chūlái le。
The water level has been increasing, and the flood has overflowed over the bank.
水涨得平了河岸。
Shuǐ zhǎng de píng le hé\'àn
The water rose until it was level with the banks.
水涨得齐了岸。
Shuǐ zhǎng de qí le àn。
The water has risen to the level of the river banks.
留学生越来越多，学费也水涨船高。
Liúxuéshēng yuèláiyuè duō，xuéfèi yě shuǐzhǎngchuángāo。
The number of overseas students is continually increasing, and there has been a corresponding increase in tuition fees.
足球运动员出了名，其身价也水涨船高。
Zúqiú yùndòngyuán chūle míng，qí shēnjià yě shuǐzhǎngchuángāo。
Once a footballer has made a name for himself, his social status increases along with his fame.
河水暴涨。
Héshuǐ bàozhǎng。
The river suddenly rose.
潮水上涨了。
Cháoshuǐ shàngzhǎng le。
The tide is coming in.
洪水猛涨，大坝告急。
Hóngshuǐ měngzhǎng，dàbà gàojí。
The dam was in danger because of the rising flood.
河水猛涨。
Héshuǐ měngzhǎng。
The river suddenly rose.
河水上涨。
Héshuǐ shàngzhǎng。
The river has risen.
潮水的涨落
cháoshuǐ de zhǎngluò 
ebb and flow of the tide
河水上涨把岸边的铁牛都冲走了。
Héshuǐ shàngzhǎng bǎ ànbiān de tiěniú dōu chōngzǒu le。
The iron oxen were all washed away by the rising river.
由于山区连续降雨，山塘的水位猛涨。
Yóuyú shānqū liánxù jiàngyǔ，shāntáng de shuǐwèi měng zhǎng。
Due to continuous rain, the water level of the ponds in the mountain has increased rapidly.
河水可能暴涨，得立即抢渡。
Héshuǐ kěnéngbàozhǎng，děi lìjí qiǎngdù。
The river may suddenly rise. We must make a swift crossing immediately.
河水不断上涨，大堤出现险情。
Héshuǐ búduàn shàngzhǎng，dàdī chūxiàn xiǎnqíng。
The river keeps rising and the dam is threatened.
洪水激剧上涨，淹没了附近的村庄。
Hóngshuǐ jījù shàngzhǎng，yānmò le fùjìn de cūnzhuāng。
The flood rapidly rose, submerging the neighboring villages.
河水暴涨，水势很猛。
河水涨了。
江水猛涨，小心发生崩岸。
岂知河水陡涨，险象环生。
连降大雨，江水暴涨
洪水猛涨，大坝告急

潮水上涨
江河水位飞涨

The river rose rapidly.
河水涨得很快。
The tide came in very quickly that we couldn\'t pick our clothes.
潮水涨得很快，我们都来不及拿衣服了。
The high tide was coming in.
Hǎishuǐ zhǎngcháo le。
海水涨潮了。
The tide came in and swept everything on the beach into the ocean.
Cháoshuǐ zhǎngle shànglái，bǎ hǎitān shàng de yíqiè dōu juǎnhuíle hǎilǐ。
潮水涨了上来，把海滩上的一切都卷回了海里。
The swollen river washed away the footbridge.
Búduàn shàngzhǎng de héshuǐ chōngkuǎle Rénháng qiáo。
不断上涨的河水冲垮了人行桥。
The flooding river crested at 30 feet.
河水暴涨时最高洪峰达到30英尺。
The eager is a tidal phenomenon of rivers.
河水上涨是一种河流的潮汐现象。
The water swells the wood.
Shuǐ pàozhàngle mùtou。
水泡涨了木头。
Heavy rains caused the rise of the water level.
Bàoyǔ dǎozhì shuǐwèi shàngzhǎng。
暴雨导致水位上涨。
The flood of the sea is a normal everyday occurrence.
Hǎishuǐ chūxiàn zhǎngcháo shì měi tiān dōuhuì fāshēng de zhèngcháng xiànxiàng。
海水出现涨潮是每天都会发生的正常现象。
the tide is coming in
潮水正在上涨
If the rain continues then the rivers could swell and burst the banks.
Rúguǒ yǔ chíxù de xià，héshuǐ jiāng huì bàozhǎng，chōngpò héchuáng。
如果雨持续地下，河水将会暴涨，冲破河床。
Sodden leaves choked the drains and made the pavements dangerous.
Pàozhǎngle de shùyè dǔsèle xiàshuǐdào，ràng rénxíngdào biàn de bù ānquán。
泡涨了的树叶堵塞了下水道，让人行道变得不安全。
Higher wages caused an escalation of prices.
Gāo xīnshuǐ zàochéngle wùjià shàngzhǎng。
高薪水造成了物价上涨。
This salary increase makes no difference to my standard of living.
Zhǎng zhèdiǎn gōngzī duì wǒ de shēnghuó shuǐpíng méishénmē yǐngxiǎng。
涨这点工资对我的生活水平没什么影响。
近来公司股票的涨势有所减缓。
Jìnlái gōngsī gǔpiào de zhǎngshì yǒusuǒ jiǎnhuǎn。
Recently, the upward trend of the company\'s stock has slown to some extent.
粮价出现涨势。
河水暴涨，水势很猛。
The current trend of prices is still rising.
现在物价还是有上涨的趋势。
他早早回家做饭庆祝这次单位涨钱。
Tā zǎozǎo huíjiā zuòfàn qìngzhù zhècì dānwèi zhǎngqián。
He returned home early to cook, so as to celebrate his raise.
价钱在涨。
jiàqian zài zhǎng

high/low tide
涨/落潮
a wide range of price
价格的大涨大落
Market runups are followed by corrections.
Shìjià shàngzhǎng hòu jiēzhe yòu huíluò。
市价上涨后接着又回落。
Market runups are invariably followed by a correction.
Gǔpiào shìchǎng shàngzhǎng zhīhòu zǒngshì zài huíluò xiàlái。
股票市场上涨之后总是再回落下来。
变相涨价
biànxiàng zhǎngjià 
disguised price increases
这个食品公司春节期间出售的货品将按有关规定核价，以防乱涨价。
Zhège shípǐn gōngsī chūnjié qījiān chūshòu de huòpǐn jiāngàn yǒuguānguīdìnghé jià，yǐfángluàn zhǎngjià。
To prevent random price hikes, the prices of goods sold by this company during Spring Festival will be verified in accordance with the regulations.
今年春运火车票不涨价，给农民工和学生带来了实惠。
Jīnnián chūnyùn huǒchēpiào bùzhǎngjià，gěi nóngmíngōng hé xuésheng dàilái le shíhuì。
The price of train tickets does not go up during spring travel, which brings real benefits to farm workers and students.
今年的稻种又涨价了。
Jīnnián de dàozhǒng yòu zhǎngjià le。
The price of rice seeds is rising again this year.
上个月物价涨幅是今年来最小的一个月。
Shànggè yuè wùjià zhǎngfú shì jīnnián lái zuì xiǎo de yígè yuè。
Last month saw the smallest price increase of the year.
物价涨了两倍。
Wùjià zhǎngle liǎngbèi。
Prices have doubled.
物价涨幅平稳。
Wùjià zhǎngfú píngwěn。
Prices are increasing, but at a steady rate.

Wùjià fēizhǎng。
Prices were skyrocketing.
物价飞涨，人心浮动。
Wùjià fēizhǎng，rénxīn fúdòng。
With the soaring of prices, there was a growing feeling of insecurity.
物价高涨。
Wùjià gāozhǎng。
Prices were skyrocketing.
物价回涨。

Prices are rising again.
物价猛涨(跌)
wùjià měngzhǎng（diē）
a sharp rise (fall) in prices

There were a lot of complaints about the rising prices.

Due to inflation, administrative costs for our hospital rose by 20% over last year.
部分商人囤积惜售造成物价飞涨。

Gas utilities raised gas rates by nearly 8% on Tuesday.

The inflated housing prices will have to come down to earth.

飞涨的房屋价格最终会回归现实。
The government hasn\'t been able to hold down house prices.
Zhèngfǔ méi néng kòngzhì zhù fángjià shàngzhǎng。

Wùjià shàngzhǎng de tài gāo le。

高薪水造成了物价上涨。
Market runups are followed by corrections.
Shìjià shàngzhǎng hòu jiēzhe yòu huíluò。
市价上涨后接着又回落。
a bull market
价格上涨的市场
with prices going up
随着物价的上涨
Prices zoomed．
价格猛涨。
a spectacular rise in house prices
房价的暴涨
If prices were uncontrolled, it would be the old-age pensioners who would suffer.
如果物价的上涨控制不住，倒霉的将是年老人。
Fuel supplies are depressed because of the oil\'s increase in price.
燃料供应因为原油价格上涨减少了。
Indications show that the house price will rise.
种种迹象表明房价将上涨。
Intelligence from reliable sources said the share price will go up.
有可靠来源的消息说股价会上涨。
Sufficient storage of oil has been prepared for the world oil price increase.
我们已经储备了充足的石油以应对世界石油价格上涨。
The rising cost of tickets depressed many fans from attending.
Piàojià de shàngzhǎng shǐde xǔduō fěnsī wàng\'érquèbù。
票价的上涨使得许多粉丝望而却步。
Gold\'s advance is a product of fear in the market.
Huángjīn jiàgé shàngzhǎng shì yóuyú shìchǎng zhōng de kǒnghuāng suǒ zàochéng de。
黄金价格上涨是由于市场中的恐慌所造成的。
Prices had risen by 50% by the close of business.
Tíngyè zhīqián，jiàgé shàngzhǎngle bǎifēnzhī wǔshí。
停业之前，价格上涨了50%。
People are crabbing about the price rise for petrol.
Rénmen zài bàoyuàn yóujià de shàngzhǎng。
人们在抱怨油价的上涨。
A rise in property prices this month is a sure thing.
Zhège yuè fángdìchǎn jiàgé shàngzhǎng shì bìrán de。
这个月房地产价格上涨是必然的。
Prices dropped by 3.3%, thanks to fears of higher interest rates.
Yóuyú hàipà shàngzhǎng de gāo lìlǜ，jiàgé xiàjiàngle 3.3%。
由于害怕上涨的高利率，价格下降了3.3%。
The price was hiked up 50 percent.
Jiàgé shàngzhǎngle bǎifēnzhī wǔshí。
价格上涨了50%。
House and land prices tend on the whole to go up rather than down.
Zǒngtǐshàng kàn，fángwū hé tǔdì jiàgé zài zhǎng érbúshì jiàng。
总体上看，房屋和土地价格在涨而不是降。
The people revolted when bread prices tripled again.
Dāng miànbāo jiàgé yòu zhǎngle sān bèi shí，rénmen kāishǐ zàofǎn le。
当面包价格又涨了三倍时，人们开始造反了。
Prices jumped overnight.
Yíyèzhījiān jiàgé měngzhǎng。
一夜之间价格猛涨。
Prices have jumped.
价格已飞涨。
a wide range of price
价格的大涨大落
With the war, prices have gone up far too high.
因为这场战争，物价已经上涨得太高了。
The multiple of the share price increase could reach three times.
股票价格的上涨倍数可能达到三倍。
As the elephant population falls, the price of ivory rises.
Suízhe dàxiàng shùliàng de jiǎnshǎo，xiàngyá de jiàgé zài shàngzhǎng。
随着大象数量的减少，象牙的价格在上涨。
With world prices for nutmeg high, producers are enjoying a boom.
Suízhe quánqiú ròudòukòu jiàgé de gāozhǎng，ròudòukòu zhòngzhízhě bào zēng。
随着全球肉豆蔻价格的高涨，肉豆蔻种植者暴增。
Other price rises will be less than the rate of inflation.
Qítā jiàgé de shàngzhǎng mànyú tōnghuòpéngzhànglǜ。
其他价格的上涨慢于通货膨胀率。
Oil at source might rise 20 % in price.
Yuányóu de jiàgé kěnéng zhǎngle bǎifēnzhī èrshí。
原油的价格可能涨了２０％。
Prices rose sharply.
Wùjià jíjù shàngzhǎng。
物价急剧上涨。
The cost of an apartment per square meter is rising.
公寓每平米的价格正在上涨。
They expect an increase in the price of pork due to cases of disease.
由于发现了多例病猪，他们预计猪肉价格将会上涨。
Spot oil price has risen by around 2% in this month.
现货石油的价格这个月涨了大约2％。
The current trend of prices is still rising.
现在物价还是有上涨的趋势。
Overall, prices of real estate are still rising.
总的说来，房价还是在上涨。
Gas was bulling higher and higher by the day.
Qìyóu jiàgé měitiān shàngzhǎng。
汽油价格每天上涨。
Prices soared upwards.
Jiàgé fēngkuáng shàngzhǎng。
价格疯狂上涨。
The price of gasoline has increased fourfold over the past two years.
Zài guòqù de liǎng nián shíjiān lǐ，qìyóu jiàgé yǐjīng shàngzhǎngle sì bèi。
在过去的两年时间里，汽油价格已经上涨了四倍。
The prices of farms rose prodigiously.
Nóngchǎng de jiàgé fēikuài shàngzhǎng。
农场的价格飞快上涨。
The price went up substantially.
Jiàgé dàfú shàngzhǎng。
价格大幅上涨。
Even house prices are rising again.
shènzhì lián fángjià dōu zàicì shàngzhǎngle。
甚至连房价都再次上涨了。
moderate to high in price
价格由平稳看涨
Rates rises even as the economy gets weak.
经济走低时，价格依然在上涨。
Housing prices have been edging up since December.
Cóng shí\'èr yuè qǐ fángjià jiù zài zhújiàn shàngzhǎng。
从十二月起房价就在逐渐上涨。
The property prices in this area have tumbled up.
Zhè yī dìqū de fángchǎn jiàgé yǐjīng xùnsù zhǎngle shànglái。
这一地区的房产价格已经迅速涨了上来。
The house price eventually leveled off after a surging period.
房价经历了快速上涨之后，终于平稳了。
The petrol price rise coupled with the tax increase was an excessive combination.
Yóujià shàngshēng hé shuìshōu shàngzhǎng yìqǐ xíngchéngle yí duì hěn guòfèn de zǔhé。
油价上升和税收上涨一起形成了一对很过分的组合。
A limited supply of land will contribute further to price rises.
Yǒuxiàn de tǔdì gōngyìng jiāng dǎozhì jiàgé de jìnyíbù shàngzhǎng。
有限的土地供应将导致价格的进一步上涨。
Property bulls were also taken back when it was announced that house prices in January fell.
Zài gōngbù yī yuèfèn fángjià xiàjiàng zhīhòu，yuánlái kànzhǎng de chǎo fáng kè yě dōu yǎnqíxīgǔ le。
在公布一月份房价下降之后，原来看涨的炒房客也都偃旗息鼓了。
The oil price has increased over the past few months.
油价在过去几个月里一直上涨。
上个月物价涨幅是今年来最小的一个月。
Shànggè yuè wùjià zhǎngfú shì jīnnián lái zuì xiǎo de yígè yuè。
Last month saw the smallest price increase of the year.
经济学家分析了近期的汇市，认为大盘近期会有很大涨幅。
Jīngjìxuéjiā fēnxī le jìnqī de huìshì，rènwéi dàpán jìnqī huì yǒu hěndà zhǎngfú。
Economists have analyzed the latest quotations on the exchange market, they think that popular shares will have a great rise in price.
物价涨幅平稳。
Wùjià zhǎngfú píngwěn。
Prices are increasing, but at a steady rate.
It is rated up there with some of the world\'s greatest hikes.
Tā de zhǎngfú shì shìjièshàng zuì gāo de zhī yī。
它的涨幅是世界上最高的之一。
August\'s jump of 5 per cent was the biggest since mid-2007.
8 yuèfèn 5% de zhǎngfú shì zì 2007 nián nián zhōng yǐlái zuìdà de。
8月份5%的涨幅是自2007年年中以来最大的。
The price went up substantially.
Jiàgé dàfú shàngzhǎng。
价格大幅上涨。
股市掀起了涨风。
Gǔshì xiānqǐ le zhǎngfēng。
There is an upswing of prices on the stock market.
涨风强劲。
The gale could set in with the next high tide.
Dàfēng kěnéng hé xià yí cì zhǎngcháo yìqǐ xílái。
大风可能和下一次涨潮一起袭来。
物价猛涨(跌)
wùjià měngzhǎng（diē）
a sharp rise (fall) in prices
股市的每一次涨跌都牵动着股民的心。
Gǔshì de měi yícì zhǎngdiē dōu qiāndòng zhe gǔmín de xīn。
Every up and down in the stock market affects the stock holders\' feelings.
近来股市有些疲困，个股只跌不涨。
Jìnlái gǔshì yǒuxiē píkùn，gè gǔ zhǐdiē bùzhǎng。
Recently, the stock market is sluggish, shares of individual companies have dropped and haven\'t gone up.
物价基本稳定，没有暴涨暴跌。
A strong cycle of alternating booms and slumps has affected all types of development.
Yí gè zhǎngdiē jiāotì de yǒulì zhōuqī yǐjīng yǐngxiǎngle gè zhǒng lèixíng de fāzhǎn。
一个涨跌交替的有力周期已经影响了各种类型的发展。
Markets can go down as well as up.
Shìchǎng jì huì shàngzhǎng，yě huì xiàdiē。
市场既会上涨，也会下跌。
经过几年的发展，我的工资已经涨到原薪的3倍了。
Jīngguò jǐnián de fāzhǎn，wǒ de gōngzī yǐjing zhǎngdào yuánxīn de sānbèi le。
After increasing for several years, my salary has tripled.
The firm\'s shares jumped to 114p.
公司的股票涨到114便士。
The price of the most widely traded North Sea crude rose to nearly $22 a barrel.
Jiāoyì zuìguǎng de běihǎi yuányóu jiàgé zhǎngdào jìn èrshíèr měiyuán yì tǒng。
交易最广的北海原油价格涨到近22美元一桶。
Her salary could rise to $33,000 a year.
Tā de gōngzī kěnéng huì zhǎng dào měi nián sānwàn sānqian měiyuán。
她的工资可能会涨到每年33000美元。
The multiple of the share price increase could reach three times.
股票价格的上涨倍数可能达到三倍。
The flooding river crested at 30 feet.
河水暴涨时最高洪峰达到30英尺。
正在涨潮。
Zhèngzài zhǎngcháo。
The tide is at the flood.
股票的价格随着市场潮涨潮落。
Gǔpiào de jiàgé suí zhe shìchǎng cháozhǎng cháoluò。
The price of stock moves up and down with the market.
此时的大海表面平静，内里却积蓄着再次涨潮的力量。
Cǐshí de dàhǎi biǎomiàn píngjìng，nèilǐ què jīxù zhe zàicì zhǎngcháo de lìliang。
The sea looks calm on the surface right now, while inside, it accumulates the power for the next rise of the tide.
潮涨了。
Cháo zhǎng le。
The tide is rising. or The tide is in.
潮水上涨了。
Cháoshuǐ shàngzhǎng le。
The tide is coming in.
潮水的涨落
cháoshuǐ de zhǎngluò 
ebb and flow of the tide
涨潮
潮涨潮落
黄金价格随市场潮涨潮落。
潮水上涨
the incoming tide
涨潮
The surge of the tide is scary.
涨潮时的巨浪非常可怕。
The high tide was coming in.
Hǎishuǐ zhǎngcháo le。
海水涨潮了。
I consulted a chart, which confirmed that I had five hours before high tide.
Wǒ kànle yíxià túbiāo，quèrèn wǒ zài zhǎngcháo qián háiyǒu wǔ xiǎoshí。
我看了一下图标，确认我在涨潮前还有五小时。
The flood of the sea is a normal everyday occurrence.
Hǎishuǐ chūxiàn zhǎngcháo shì měi tiān dōuhuì fāshēng de zhèngcháng xiànxiàng。
海水出现涨潮是每天都会发生的正常现象。
The tide will flow when the sun rises.
Tàiyáng shēngqǐ shí jiāng zhǎngcháo。
太阳升起时将涨潮。
He had been walking on the riverbank observing a high tide.
Tā céng zài hédī shàng xíngzǒu，guānchá zhǎngcháo de qíngkuàng。
他曾在河堤上行走，观察涨潮的情况。
A tide in the affairs of men which, taken at the flood, leads on to fortune.
Rénshēng zǒng yǒu zhǎngcháo shí，bǎwò shíjī，biànnéng gōngchéngmíngjiù。
人生总有涨潮时，把握时机，便能功成名就。
When the tide came in I was a maroon out there.
Zhǎngcháo shí，wǒ zài nàlǐ yóudàng。
涨潮时，我在那里游荡。
The gale could set in with the next high tide.
Dàfēng kěnéng hé xià yí cì zhǎngcháo yìqǐ xílái。
大风可能和下一次涨潮一起袭来。
Extremely risky going out in the tide and fog.
Zài zhǎngcháo hé yǒu wù shí wàichū shì jíduān màoxiǎn de。
在涨潮和有雾时外出是极端冒险的。
high/low tide
涨/落潮
We moved back from the encroaching tide.
Wǒmen cóng shàngzhǎng de cháoxī zhōng fǎnhuí。
我们从上涨的潮汐中返回。
The tide came in very quickly that we couldn\'t pick our clothes.
潮水涨得很快，我们都来不及拿衣服了。
The tide came in and swept everything on the beach into the ocean.
Cháoshuǐ zhǎngle shànglái，bǎ hǎitān shàng de yíqiè dōu juǎnhuíle hǎilǐ。
潮水涨了上来，把海滩上的一切都卷回了海里。
the tide is coming in
潮水正在上涨
The eager is a tidal phenomenon of rivers.
河水上涨是一种河流的潮汐现象。
通货一膨胀，物价就涨，水涨船高嘛。
Tōnghuò yì péngzhàng，wùjià jiù zhǎng，shuǐzhǎngchuángāo ma。
Prices rise in proportion to inflation, like boats going up with the level of the water.
河水暴涨。
Héshuǐ bàozhǎng。
The river suddenly rose.
物价暴涨。
Wùjià bàozhǎng。
Prices soared (or skyrocketed).
变相涨价
biànxiàng zhǎngjià 
disguised price increases

Cháoshuǐ shàngzhǎng le。
The tide is coming in.
物价飞涨。
Wùjià fēizhǎng。
Prices were skyrocketing.
物价飞涨，人心浮动。
Wùjià fēizhǎng，rénxīn fúdòng。
With the soaring of prices, there was a growing feeling of insecurity.
群众热情高涨。
Qúnzhòng rèqíng gāozhǎng。
The enthusiasm of the masses ran high.
物价高涨。
Wùjià gāozhǎng。
Prices were skyrocketing.
洪水猛涨，大坝告急。
Hóngshuǐ měngzhǎng，dàbà gàojí。
The dam was in danger because of the rising flood.
行情见涨。
Hángqíngjiàn zhǎng。
A rising market is expected.
这个食品公司春节期间出售的货品将按有关规定核价，以防乱涨价。
Zhège shípǐn gōngsī chūnjié qījiān chūshòu de huòpǐn jiāngàn yǒuguānguīdìnghé jià，yǐfángluàn zhǎngjià。
To prevent random price hikes, the prices of goods sold by this company during Spring Festival will be verified in accordance with the regulations.
物价回涨。
Wùjià huízhǎng。
Prices are rising again.
价钱在涨。
jiàqian zài zhǎng
The prices are rising.
河水猛涨。
Héshuǐ měngzhǎng。
The river suddenly rose.
物价猛涨(跌)
wùjià měngzhǎng（diē）
a sharp rise (fall) in prices
水涨得平了河岸。
Shuǐ zhǎng de píng le hé\'àn
The water rose until it was level with the banks.
水涨得齐了岸。
Shuǐ zhǎng de qí le àn。
The water has risen to the level of the river banks.
河水可能暴涨，得立即抢渡。
Héshuǐ kěnéngbàozhǎng，děi lìjí qiǎngdù。
The river may suddenly rise. We must make a swift crossing immediately.
情绪高涨。
Qíngxù gāozhǎng。
Morale is high.
河水上涨。
Héshuǐ shàngzhǎng。
The river has risen.
物价上涨。
Wùjià shàngzhǎng。
The prices are going up.
河水不断上涨，大堤出现险情。
Héshuǐ búduàn shàngzhǎng，dàdī chūxiàn xiǎnqíng。
The river keeps rising and the dam is threatened.
人们对物价上涨颇有怨言。
Rénmen duì wùjià shàngzhǎngpō yǒu yuànyán。
There were a lot of complaints about the rising prices.
因物价上涨，我们医院今年的行政经费比去年增支20%。
Yīn wùjià shàngzhǎng，wǒmen yīyuàn jīnnián de xíngzhèngjingfèi bǐ qùnián zēngzhī bǎifēnzhī èrshí。
Due to inflation, administrative costs for our hospital rose by 20% over last year.
潮涨了。
Cháo zhǎng le。
The tide is rising. or The tide is in.
火车票又涨了。
Huǒchēpiào yòu zhǎng le。
Train fares are rising again.
正在涨潮。
Zhèngzài zhǎngcháo。
The tide is at the flood.
股市掀起了涨风。

Shànggè yuè wùjià zhǎngfú shì jīnnián lái zuì xiǎo de yígè yuè。
Last month saw the smallest price increase of the year.
潮水的涨落
cháoshuǐ de zhǎngluò 
ebb and flow of the tide
价格的涨落
jiàgé de zhǎngluò 
fluctuations of prices
豆子泡涨了。
Dòuzi pàozhàng le。
The beans swelled up after being soaked.
气得涨红了脸
qì de zhànghóng le liǎn 
redden (or flush) with anger
上个月他钱花涨了。
Shànggè yuè tā qián huā zhàng le。
Last month he couldn\'t make ends meet.
看见他那气得紫涨的脸，我真不知说什么好。
Kànjiàn tā nà qì de zǐzhàng de liǎn，wǒ zhēn bùzhī shuō shénme hǎo。
When I saw his angry red face, I didn\'t know what to say.
股票的价格随着市场潮涨潮落。
Gǔpiào de jiàgé suí zhe shìchǎng cháozhǎng cháoluò。
The price of stock moves up and down with the market.
今年春运火车票不涨价，给农民工和学生带来了实惠。
Jīnnián chūnyùn huǒchēpiào bùzhǎngjià，gěi nóngmíngōng hé xuésheng dàilái le shíhuì。
The price of train tickets does not go up during spring travel, which brings real benefits to farm workers and students.
今年的稻种又涨价了。
Jīnnián de dàozhǒng yòu zhǎngjià le。
The price of rice seeds is rising again this year.
由于大量食用观音土充饥，他开始腹涨。
Yóuyú dàliàng shíyòng guānyīntǔ chōngjī，tā kāishǐ fùzhàng。
After eating a large amount of white clay to ease his hunger, he began to have abdominal distension.
证券交易所的红盘显示，股指略有上涨。
Zhèngquàn jiāoyìsuǒ de hóngpán xiǎnshì，gǔzhǐ lüèyǒu shàngzhǎng。
The red digital in the stock exchange indicates that the stock index has risen slightly.
经济学家分析了近期的汇市，认为大盘近期会有很大涨幅。
Jīngjìxuéjiā fēnxī le jìnqī de huìshì，rènwéi dàpán jìnqī huì yǒu hěndà zhǎngfú。
Economists have analyzed the latest quotations on the exchange market, they think that popular shares will have a great rise in price.
洪水激剧上涨，淹没了附近的村庄。
Hóngshuǐ jījù shàngzhǎng，yānmò le fùjìn de cūnzhuāng。
The flood rapidly rose, submerging the neighboring villages.
近期螺纹钢的价格持续上涨。
Jìnqī luówéngāng de jiàgé chíxù shàngzhǎng。
The price of thread steel has been increasing recently.
水位不断上涨，洪水已经从堤坝上漫流出来了。
Shuǐwèi búduàn shàngzhǎng，hóngshuǐ yǐjing cóng dībà shàng mànliú chūlái le。
The water level has been increasing, and the flood has overflowed over the bank.
此时的大海表面平静，内里却积蓄着再次涨潮的力量。
Cǐshí de dàhǎi biǎomiàn píngjìng，nèilǐ què jīxù zhe zàicì zhǎngcháo de lìliang。
The sea looks calm on the surface right now, while inside, it accumulates the power for the next rise of the tide.
涨工资后，我的年收入比去年增加了8000元呢。
Zhǎng gōngzī hòu，wǒ de nián shōurù bǐ qùnián zēngjiā le bāqiānyuán ne。
Since my salary has been raised, my annual income has increased by eight thousand yuan over last year.
年后股市盘面乐观，都在看涨。
Niánhòu gǔshì pánmiàn lèguān，dōu zài kànzhǎng。
The stock market is bullish after the new year, all stocks are rising in price.
近来股市有些疲困，个股只跌不涨。
Jìnlái gǔshì yǒuxiē píkùn，gè gǔ zhǐdiē bùzhǎng。
Recently, the stock market is sluggish, shares of individual companies have dropped and haven\'t gone up.
由于山区连续降雨，山塘的水位猛涨。
Yóuyú shānqū liánxù jiàngyǔ，shāntáng de shuǐwèi měng zhǎng。
Due to continuous rain, the water level of the ponds in the mountain has increased rapidly.
河水上涨把岸边的铁牛都冲走了。
Héshuǐ shàngzhǎng bǎ ànbiān de tiěniú dōu chōngzǒu le。
The iron oxen were all washed away by the rising river.
部分商人囤积惜售造成物价飞涨。
Bùfen shāngrén túnjī xīshòu zàochéng wùjià fēizhǎng。
Some of the businessmen\'s over stocking of goods, and reluctance to sell caused an increase in prices.
电器产品现期价格在不断上涨。
Diànqì chǎnpǐn xiànqī jiàgé zài búduàn shàngzhǎng。
The current prices of electric appliances are increasing all the time.
听说要涨薪资了。
Tīngshuō yào zhǎng xīnzī le。
It is said our salary will rise.
经过几年的发展，我的工资已经涨到原薪的3倍了。
Jīngguò jǐnián de fāzhǎn，wǒ de gōngzī yǐjing zhǎngdào yuánxīn de sānbèi le。
After increasing for several years, my salary has tripled.
上海的地价比前几年增涨了几倍。
Shànghǎi de dìjià bǐ qián jǐnián zēngzhǎng le jǐ bèi。
The land price in Shanghai has increased  several times in the last few years.
股市的每一次涨跌都牵动着股民的心。
Gǔshì de měi yícì zhǎngdiē dōu qiāndòng zhe gǔmín de xīn。
Every up and down in the stock market affects the stock holders\' feelings.
他早早回家做饭庆祝这次单位涨钱。
Tā zǎozǎo huíjiā zuòfàn qìngzhù zhècì dānwèi zhǎngqián。
He returned home early to cook, so as to celebrate his raise.
近来公司股票的涨势有所减缓。
Jìnlái gōngsī gǔpiào de zhǎngshì yǒusuǒ jiǎnhuǎn。
Recently, the upward trend of the company\'s stock has slown to some extent.
由于柞蚕的大批病死，丝价一路上涨。
Yóuyú zhàcán de dàpī bìngsǐ，sījià yílù shàngzhǎng。
Because tussahs are dying in large quantities, the price of silk keeps increasing.
物价涨了两倍。
Wùjià zhǎngle liǎngbèi。
Prices have doubled.
物价高涨。
Wùjià gāozhǎng。
Prices are rocketing.
物价渐渐上涨。
Wùjià jiànjiàn shàngzhǎng.
Prices are gradually going up.
英镑看涨。
Yīngbàng kànzhǎng.
The pound is expected to rise.
留学生越来越多，学费也水涨船高。
Liúxuéshēng yuèláiyuè duō，xuéfèi yě shuǐzhǎngchuángāo。
The number of overseas students is continually increasing, and there has been a corresponding increase in tuition fees.
足球运动员出了名，其身价也水涨船高。
Zúqiú yùndòngyuán chūle míng，qí shēnjià yě shuǐzhǎngchuángāo。
Once a footballer has made a name for himself, his social status increases along with his fame.
物价涨幅平稳。
Wùjià zhǎngfú píngwěn。
Prices are increasing, but at a steady rate.

Gold\'s advance is a product of fear in the market.

黄金价格上涨是由于市场中的恐慌所造成的。
With world prices for nutmeg high, producers are enjoying a boom.

随着全球肉豆蔻价格的高涨，肉豆蔻种植者暴增。

Zài gōngbù yī yuèfèn fángjià xiàjiàng zhīhòu，yuánlái kànzhǎng de chǎo fáng kè yě dōu yǎnqíxīgǔ le。
在公布一月份房价下降之后，原来看涨的炒房客也都偃旗息鼓了。
Gas was bulling higher and higher by the day.
Qìyóu jiàgé měitiān shàngzhǎng。
汽油价格每天上涨。
He checked his cries, going red in the face with effort.
Tā yìzhì zhù le kūqì，liǎn yīnwèi yònglì zhàng de tōnghóng。
他抑制住了哭泣，脸因为用力涨的通红。
Sodden leaves choked the drains and made the pavements dangerous.

Zhè yī dìqū de fángchǎn jiàgé yǐjīng xùnsù zhǎngle shànglái。
这一地区的房产价格已经迅速涨了上来。
In 1930, thousands of workers walked out of more than 70 factories for better wages.
Yījiǔsānlíng nián，shùyǐqiānjì de gōngrén jìnxíng bàgōng yāoqiú zhǎng xīn。
1930年，数以千计的工人进行罢工要求涨新。
Her salary could rise to $33,000 a year.
Tā de gōngzī kěnéng huì zhǎng dào měi nián sānwàn sānqian měiyuán。
她的工资可能会涨到每年33000美元。
Oil at source might rise 20 % in price.
Yuányóu de jiàgé kěnéng zhǎngle bǎifēnzhī èrshí。
原油的价格可能涨了２０％。
He had been walking on the riverbank observing a high tide.
Tā céng zài hédī shàng xíngzǒu，guānchá zhǎngcháo de qíngkuàng。
他曾在河堤上行走，观察涨潮的情况。
A tide in the affairs of men which, taken at the flood, leads on to fortune.
Rénshēng zǒng yǒu zhǎngcháo shí，bǎwò shíjī，biànnéng gōngchéngmíngjiù。
人生总有涨潮时，把握时机，便能功成名就。
Prices have gone up far too high.
Wùjià shàngzhǎng de tài gāo le。
物价上涨得太高了。
They took drugs to get a high on.
Tāmen chīyào bǎochí gāozhǎng de qíngxù。
他们吃药保持高涨的情绪。
This salary increase makes no difference to my standard of living.
Zhǎng zhèdiǎn gōngzī duì wǒ de shēnghuó shuǐpíng méishénmē yǐngxiǎng。
涨这点工资对我的生活水平没什么影响。
The swollen river washed away the footbridge.
Búduàn shàngzhǎng de héshuǐ chōngkuǎle Rénháng qiáo。
不断上涨的河水冲垮了人行桥。
The charges were inflated.
Fèiyòng yòu shàngzhǎng le。
费用又上涨了。
The stock market gained 24 points today.
Gǔshì jīntiān shàngzhǎng èrshísì diǎn。
股市今天上涨24点。
He gave me an increase in salary.
Tā gěi wǒ zhǎngle gōngzī。
他给我涨了工资。
Prices soared upwards.
Jiàgé fēngkuáng shàngzhǎng。
价格疯狂上涨。
The market is up.
Shìchǎng hángqíng shàngzhǎng。
市场行情上涨。
The corn is up.
Yùmǐ zhǎngjià le。
玉米涨价了。
The people revolted when bread prices tripled again.
Dāng miànbāo jiàgé yòu zhǎngle sān bèi shí，rénmen kāishǐ zàofǎn le。
当面包价格又涨了三倍时，人们开始造反了。
The water swells the wood.
Shuǐ pàozhàngle mùtou。
水泡涨了木头。
Prices jumped overnight.
Yíyèzhījiān jiàgé měngzhǎng。
一夜之间价格猛涨。
Market runups are invariably followed by a correction.
Gǔpiào shìchǎng shàngzhǎng zhīhòu zǒngshì zài huíluò xiàlái。
股票市场上涨之后总是再回落下来。
The price of gasoline has increased fourfold over the past two years.
Zài guòqù de liǎng nián shíjiān lǐ，qìyóu jiàgé yǐjīng shàngzhǎngle sì bèi。
在过去的两年时间里，汽油价格已经上涨了四倍。
When the tide came in I was a maroon out there.
Zhǎngcháo shí，wǒ zài nàlǐ yóudàng。
涨潮时，我在那里游荡。
The dead man\'s stomach was bloated.
Shītǐ de dùzi zhǎng qǐlái。
尸体的肚子涨起来。
The prices of farms rose prodigiously.
Nóngchǎng de jiàgé fēikuài shàngzhǎng。
农场的价格飞快上涨。
Higher wages caused an escalation of prices.
Gāo xīnshuǐ zàochéngle wùjià shàngzhǎng。
高薪水造成了物价上涨。
We moved back from the encroaching tide.
Wǒmen cóng shàngzhǎng de cháoxī zhōng fǎnhuí。
我们从上涨的潮汐中返回。
Our rent increased threefold in the past five years.
Zài guòqù 5 nián lǐ，wǒmen de fángwū zūjīn zhǎngle 3 bèi。
在过去5年里，我们的房屋租金涨了3倍。
The price went up substantially.
Jiàgé dàfú shàngzhǎng。
价格大幅上涨。
The gale could set in with the next high tide.
Dàfēng kěnéng hé xià yí cì zhǎngcháo yìqǐ xílái。
大风可能和下一次涨潮一起袭来。
Market runups are followed by corrections.
Shìjià shàngzhǎng hòu jiēzhe yòu huíluò。
市价上涨后接着又回落。
British nationalism was in the air and patriotic sentiments ran high.
Yīngguó mínzú zhǔyì shèngxíng，àiguó qíngxù gāozhǎng。
英国民族主义盛行，爱国情绪高涨。
Prices rose sharply.
Wùjià jíjù shàngzhǎng。
物价急剧上涨。
Extremely risky going out in the tide and fog.
Zài zhǎngcháo hé yǒu wù shí wàichū shì jíduān màoxiǎn de。
在涨潮和有雾时外出是极端冒险的。
There is upside potential to the September ISM manufacturing index
&amp;ldquo;9 yuèfèn de ISM zhìzàoyè zhǐshù yǒu shàngzhǎng qiánlì。&amp;rdquo;
9月份的ISM制造业指数有上涨潜力。
Even house prices are rising again.
shènzhì lián fángjià dōu zàicì shàngzhǎngle。
甚至连房价都再次上涨了。
Markets can go down as well as up.
Shìchǎng jì huì shàngzhǎng，yě huì xiàdiē。
市场既会上涨，也会下跌。
August\'s jump of 5 per cent was the biggest since mid-2007.
8 yuèfèn 5% de zhǎngfú shì zì 2007 nián nián zhōng yǐlái zuìdà de。
8月份5%的涨幅是自2007年年中以来最大的。
The stock has since risen eight times.
cǐhòu gāi gǔ yǐ shàngzhǎng 8 bèi。
此后该股已上涨8倍。
通货一膨胀，物价就涨，水涨船高嘛。
Tōnghuò yì péngzhàng，wùjià jiù zhǎng，shuǐzhǎngchuángāo ma。
Prices rise in proportion to inflation, like boats going up with the level of the water.
留学生越来越多，学费也水涨船高。
Liúxuéshēng yuèláiyuè duō，xuéfèi yě shuǐzhǎngchuángāo。
The number of overseas students is continually increasing, and there has been a corresponding increase in tuition fees.
足球运动员出了名，其身价也水涨船高。
Zúqiú yùndòngyuán chūle míng，qí shēnjià yě shuǐzhǎngchuángāo。
Once a footballer has made a name for himself, his social status increases along with his fame.
水位不断上涨，洪水已经从堤坝上漫流出来了。
Shuǐwèi búduàn shàngzhǎng，hóngshuǐ yǐjing cóng dībà shàng mànliú chūlái le。
The water level has been increasing, and the flood has overflowed over the bank.
潮水上涨了。
Cháoshuǐ shàngzhǎng le。
The tide is coming in.
河水上涨。
Héshuǐ shàngzhǎng。
The river has risen.
物价上涨。
Wùjià shàngzhǎng。
The prices are going up.
河水不断上涨，大堤出现险情。
Héshuǐ búduàn shàngzhǎng，dàdī chūxiàn xiǎnqíng。
The river keeps rising and the dam is threatened.
人们对物价上涨颇有怨言。
Rénmen duì wùjià shàngzhǎngpō yǒu yuànyán。
There were a lot of complaints about the rising prices.
因物价上涨，我们医院今年的行政经费比去年增支20%。
Yīn wùjià shàngzhǎng，wǒmen yīyuàn jīnnián de xíngzhèngjingfèi bǐ qùnián zēngzhī bǎifēnzhī èrshí。
Due to inflation, administrative costs for our hospital rose by 20% over last year.
证券交易所的红盘显示，股指略有上涨。
Zhèngquàn jiāoyìsuǒ de hóngpán xiǎnshì，gǔzhǐ lüèyǒu shàngzhǎng。
The red digital in the stock exchange indicates that the stock index has risen slightly.
洪水激剧上涨，淹没了附近的村庄。
Hóngshuǐ jījù shàngzhǎng，yānmò le fùjìn de cūnzhuāng。
The flood rapidly rose, submerging the neighboring villages.
近期螺纹钢的价格持续上涨。
Jìnqī luówéngāng de jiàgé chíxù shàngzhǎng。
The price of thread steel has been increasing recently.
河水上涨把岸边的铁牛都冲走了。
Héshuǐ shàngzhǎng bǎ ànbiān de tiěniú dōu chōngzǒu le。
The iron oxen were all washed away by the rising river.
电器产品现期价格在不断上涨。
Diànqì chǎnpǐn xiànqī jiàgé zài búduàn shàngzhǎng。
The current prices of electric appliances are increasing all the time.
由于柞蚕的大批病死，丝价一路上涨。
Yóuyú zhàcán de dàpī bìngsǐ，sījià yílù shàngzhǎng。
Because tussahs are dying in large quantities, the price of silk keeps increasing.
物价渐渐上涨。
Wùjià jiànjiàn shàngzhǎng.
Prices are gradually going up.
上个月物价涨幅是今年来最小的一个月。
Shànggè yuè wùjià zhǎngfú shì jīnnián lái zuì xiǎo de yígè yuè。
Last month saw the smallest price increase of the year.
上个月他钱花涨了。
Shànggè yuè tā qián huā zhàng le。
Last month he couldn\'t make ends meet.
上海的地价比前几年增涨了几倍。
Shànghǎi de dìjià bǐ qián jǐnián zēngzhǎng le jǐ bèi。
The land price in Shanghai has increased  several times in the last few years.

股票市场上周仅上涨了0.3个百分点。
The news shows US oil price increasing.
新闻显示美国油价上涨。
Rates rises even as the economy gets weak.
经济走低时，价格依然在上涨。

因为这场战争，物价已经上涨得太高了。
The company\'s profit showed a gain of 10% last year.
去年这家公司的利润上涨了10%。
the tide is coming in
潮水正在上涨
Consumers will be hit hard by the rise in prices.
物价上涨对消费者打击重大。
The eager is a tidal phenomenon of rivers.
河水上涨是一种河流的潮汐现象。
China railway raised freight rates to offset domestic oil price rise.
中国铁道部提高了货物运费以抵消国内油价上涨带来的影响。
The current trend of prices is still rising.
现在物价还是有上涨的趋势。
If prices were uncontrolled, it would be the old-age pensioners who would suffer.
如果物价的上涨控制不住，倒霉的将是年老人。
Fuel supplies are depressed because of the oil\'s increase in price.
燃料供应因为原油价格上涨减少了。
The house price eventually leveled off after a surging period.
房价经历了快速上涨之后，终于平稳了。
The crop failure resulted in a food price rise.
作物歉收导致了物价上涨。
Indications show that the house price will rise.
种种迹象表明房价将上涨。
Intelligence from reliable sources said the share price will go up.
有可靠来源的消息说股价会上涨。
The multiple of the share price increase could reach three times.
股票价格的上涨倍数可能达到三倍。
Overall, prices of real estate are still rising.
总的说来，房价还是在上涨。
A price rise was proposed by the distributor to compensate for the rising costs.
批发商建议涨价以抵消成本的上涨。
Sufficient storage of oil has been prepared for the world oil price increase.
我们已经储备了充足的石油以应对世界石油价格上涨。
The rising cost of tickets depressed many fans from attending.
Piàojià de shàngzhǎng shǐde xǔduō fěnsī wàng\'érquèbù。
票价的上涨使得许多粉丝望而却步。
As the elephant population falls, the price of ivory rises.
Suízhe dàxiàng shùliàng de jiǎnshǎo，xiàngyá de jiàgé zài shàngzhǎng。
随着大象数量的减少，象牙的价格在上涨。
Bad news drives the price of the stock downwards, and good news upwards.
Huàixiāoxī dàidòng gǔjià xiàjiàng，hǎoxiāoxī tuīdòng gǔjià shàngzhǎng。
坏消息带动股价下降，好消息推动股价上涨。
Gold\'s advance is a product of fear in the market.
Huángjīn jiàgé shàngzhǎng shì yóuyú shìchǎng zhōng de kǒnghuāng suǒ zàochéng de。
黄金价格上涨是由于市场中的恐慌所造成的。
Gas was bulling higher and higher by the day.
Qìyóu jiàgé měitiān shàngzhǎng。
汽油价格每天上涨。
Prices had risen by 50% by the close of business.
Tíngyè zhīqián，jiàgé shàngzhǎngle bǎifēnzhī wǔshí。
停业之前，价格上涨了50%。
The petrol price rise coupled with the tax increase was an excessive combination.

油价上升和税收上涨一起形成了一对很过分的组合。
People are crabbing about the price rise for petrol.
Rénmen zài bàoyuàn yóujià de shàngzhǎng。
人们在抱怨油价的上涨。

有限的土地供应将导致价格的进一步上涨。
Manufacturers complained that the new regulation would cause a rise in their costs.

Prices dropped by 3.3%, thanks to fears of higher interest rates.
Yóuyú hàipà shàngzhǎng de gāo lìlǜ，jiàgé xiàjiàngle 3.3%。
由于害怕上涨的高利率，价格下降了3.3%。
Gas utilities raised gas rates by nearly 8% on Tuesday.

Taxation on petrol need not necessarily be increased.

剧本中就是这么说的：窦娥受冤屈死，三桩誓愿件件应验。
Jùběn zhōng jiùshì zhème shuō de：Dòué shòuyuān qūsǐ，sān zhuāng shìyuàn jiànjiàn yìngyàn。
The play tells that Dou E died in injustice, but her wishes all came true.
他在“四清”运动中受到了迫害，是被冤枉的。
Tā zài“sìqīng”yùndòng zhōng shòudào le pòhài，shì bèi yuānwǎng de。
He was unfairly persecuted in the &quot;Four Clearances&quot;, which meant clearing of politics, clearing of organization, clearing of economy and clearing of ideology.
经过调解，这对冤家终于握手言和了。
Jīngguò tiáojiě，zhè duì yuānjia zhōng yú wòshǒu yánhé le。
After mediation the enemies finally shook hands, and reconciled.
盼了许久，大法官终于为他洗冤了。
Pàn le xǔjiǔ，dàfǎguān zhōng yú wèi tā xǐyuān le。
Having waited for so long, he is finally cleared of the false charges.
根据他的所作所为，称呼他为乡愿一点都不冤枉。
Gēnjù tā de suǒzuò suǒwéi，chēnghū tā wéi xiāngyuàn yìdiǎn dōu bùyuānwang。
It is no exaggeration to call him a hypocrite, after what he has done.
文中的那段话引自关汉卿的名剧《窦娥冤》。
Wén zhōng de nàduàn huà yǐnzì Guān Hànqīng de míngjù《Dòu\'éyuān》。
That piece from the book is a quote from the famous play of Guan Hanqing, named &quot;Dou E\'s Injustice&quot;.
她受到了莫大的冤屈，却有口难辩。
Tā shòudào le mòdà de yuānqū，què yǒukǒu nánbiàn。
She is suffering a huge injustice, but finds it hard to defend herself.
她一生中经历了许多冤苦，却从不对外人说。
Tā yìshēng zhōng jīnglì le xǔduō yuānkǔ，què cóngbùduì wàirén shuō。
Though she has been through lots of injustice, she never brought it up with others.
从迷信的说法看，这是冤孽作祟。
Cóng míxìn de shuōfǎ kàn，zhèshì yuānniè zuòsuì。
According to superstitious belief, this is because of retribution for bad deeds.
碰到你我就倒霉，你可真是我的冤孽。
Pèngdào nǐ wǒ jiù dǎoméi，nǐ kě zhēnshì wǒ de yuānniè。
Every time I run into you, I have bad luck. You are really my misfortune.
因为不愿下车问路，他们跑了不少冤枉路。
Yīnwéi búyuàn xiàchē wènlù，tāmen pǎo le bùshǎo yuānwanglù。
As he didn\'t want to get out of the car to ask the way, they have gone the long way round.
《窦娥冤》是一部著名的元杂剧。
《Dòuéyuān》shì yíbù zhùmíng de yuánzájù。
Snow in the summer is a famous Zajufrom the Yuan Dynasty.
真是冤家路窄，这两个仇人居然碰到了一起。
Zhēnshi yuānjiā lùzhǎi，zhè liǎnggè chóurén jūrán pèngdào le yìqǐ。
Just as the old saying,&quot;Enemies are bound to meet on a narrow road&quot;, what a coincidence it is these two foes came aross each other.

Chúfáng yǔ qǐjūshì shì gékāi de。
厨房与起居室是隔开的。
We had to carry back the dishes into the kitchen after we finished dinner.
Wǎnfàn hòu， wǒmen bùdébù bǎ cài duānhuí chúfáng。
晚饭后，我们不得不把菜端回厨房。
Steven went back into the kitchen to dish up.
Shǐdìwén fǎnhuí chúfáng zhǔnbèi shàngcài。
史蒂文返回厨房准备上菜。
A breakfast bar divided the kitchen from the sitting room.
Yí gè zǎocānbā bǎ chúfáng hé qǐjūshì fēnkāi。
一个早餐吧把厨房和起居室分开。
The dog was eating away in the kitchen.
Nà zhī gǒu zài chúfáng lǐ chī gè bùtíng。
那只狗在厨房里吃个不停。
The glass theme was extended to the kitchen doors.
Bōli de zhǔtí bèi yánshēn dàole chúfáng de ménshàng。
玻璃的主题被延伸到了厨房的门上。
Everyone fell to the kitchen for lunch.
Měigèrén dōu dào chúfáng chī wǔfàn。
每个人都到厨房吃午饭。
Birds will flock to the table outside the kitchen window.
Xiǎoniǎo jiāng chéngqún de fēidào chúfáng chuāngwài de zhuōzi shàng。
小鸟将成群地飞到厨房窗外的桌子上。
Kitchen porters were hosing out galvanised bins.
Chúfáng bānyùngōng zhèngzài chōngxǐ dùxīntǒng。
厨房搬运工正在冲洗镀锌桶。
The kitchen area also opened off the room.
Chúfáng qū yě tōngdào zhège fángjiān。
厨房区也通道这个房间。
I assume it overflowed into the kitchen below.
Wǒ xiǎng tā liúdào xiàmiàn de chúfáng qù le。
我想它流到下面的厨房去了。
In the kitchen, I pulled out a folding chair and sat down.

在厨房里，我拖出一把折叠椅然后坐了下来。
We have to finish tidying up in the kitchen.

The man dried his hands then walked back into the kitchen.

chúshī
cook; chef

毛虫是蝴蝶的幼虫；蝌蚪是青蛙的幼体。

被幼虫咬空的树叶

某些蛾的幼虫所纺出的网就像地毯一样。

苹果上有一个虫眼，要把它挖掉再吃。

kūnchóngxuéjiā
entomologist

Toads, when they seize one end of a worm, methodically rake the length of it to remove any sticks or earth that might be stuck to it.
Chánchú zài zhuāzhù chóngzi de yìduān hòu，tā huì xìtǒng de sǎoshì tā de chángdù，yǐbiàn chúqù zhānzài chóngzi shēnshàng de shùzhī huòzhě nítǔ。
蟾蜍在抓住虫子的一端后，它会系统地扫视它的长度，以便除去粘在虫子身上的树枝或者泥土。
Foxes will scratch up grass to find tasty bug and beetle morsels.
Húli huì wā cǎodì，xúnzhǎo měiwèi de chóngzi hé jiǎkéchóng。
狐狸会挖草地，寻找美味的虫子和甲壳虫。
In some countries, people eat live bugs.
有些国家的人生吃虫子。
Yesterday an insect bit me on my neck.
昨天我的脖子被虫子咬了。
Worm-eating birds identify a specific piece of earth.
吃虫子的鸟可以鉴别土质。
Gaby could hardly be convinced that eating worms was a good idea.
盖比大概不会相信吃虫子是个好主意。
Nobody live on that island because there are too many insects and snakes.
那个岛上没人住，因为有太多的虫子和蛇。
I suddenly felt an insect crawling up my arm.
我突然感觉到一只虫子在我胳膊上爬。
That apple is crawling with wiggly worms.
那个苹果上满是蠕动的虫子。
The boy was twitching a bug between his fingers.
Xiǎonánhái yòng shǒuzhǐ shǐjìn de niēzhe yì zhī xiǎo chóngzi。
小男孩用手指使劲地捏着一只小虫子。
He was digging at the worms with a stick.
Tā zhèng yòng gùnzi chuō chóngzi。
他正用棍子戳虫子。
People were complaining of bed bugs in the hotels.
Rénmen bàoyuàn lǚguǎn de chuáng shàng yǒu xiǎochóngzi。
人们抱怨旅馆的床上有小虫子。
My skin crawled, and I shivered a bit as I stood there.
Wǒ gǎnjué pífū shàng yǒu chóngzi zàipá，suǒyǐ wǒ zhànzài nà de shíhou dǒule yíxià。
我感觉皮肤上有虫子在爬，所以我站在那的时候抖了一下。
My skin crawled--I was terrified.
Wǒ de pífū shàng gǎnjué yǒu chóngzi zài pá，xià sǐ wǒ le。
我的皮肤上感觉有虫子在爬，吓死我了。
Don\'t scratch your insect bites!
Bié zhuānáo bèi chóngzi yǎo de Dìfang。
别抓挠被虫子咬的地方。
He examined the child\'s head for vermin.
Tā jiǎnchále háizi de tóufa，kàn shìfǒu yǒu chóngzi。
他检查了孩子的头发，看是否有虫子。
I had a creepy-crawly feeling.
Wǒ gǎnjué fǎngfú yǒu chóngzi zài shēnshàng pá。
我感觉仿佛有虫子在身上爬。
The exterminator disinfests the house.
Shāchóngjì gěi zhè suǒ fángzi qūchóng。
杀虫剂给这所房子驱虫。
She wanted to shellac the desk to protect it from water spots.
Tā xiǎng gěi zhè zhāng zhuōzi shàng chóngjiāoqī，yǐfángzhǐ tā shòu shuǐzì de yǐngxiǎng。
她想给这张桌子上虫胶漆，以防止它受水渍的影响。
The foul smell of the stinkhorn attracts insects that carry the spores away on their feet.
Chòujiǎojūn de chòuwèi yǐnlái kūnchóng jiāng gēnbù de bāozǐ yùnzǒu。
臭角菌的臭味引来昆虫将根部的孢子运走。
You will need to put fine netting over the cage to prevent the insects from escaping.
Nǐ děi bǎ zhège lóngzi hǎohao zhào qǐlái，yǐfáng kūnchóng fēi zǒu。
你得把这个笼子好好罩起来，以防昆虫飞走。
Worms are an example of invertebrate animals.
Rúchóng shì wú jǐzhuī dòngwù de yí gè lìzi。
蠕虫是无脊椎动物的一个例子。
The pesticide also kills the seed bank of native plant species.
Shāchóngjì hái huǐdiào tiānrán zhíwù wùzhǒng de zhǒngzi kù。
杀虫剂还毁掉天然植物物种的种子库。
闹虫灾
nào chónɡzāi
suffer from insect pests
今年庄稼遭了虫灾，肯定是个歉岁了。
Jīnnián zhuāngjià zāo le chóngzāi，kěndìng shì gè qiànsuì le。
The crops suffered from insect plague this year, it will definitely be a lean year.
虫灾
蝗虫为灾，秀草不实。
